story:
Who am I? I am a medium, clairvoyant, and angel communicator and ever since I was little I saw and sensed ghosts and spirits.  In my journey to learn how to understand what was happening, protect myself, and work with them safely (the topic of my first book Life and the After-Life), I started working with angels.  I experienced profound shifts in my life once I invited the angels to help me, and I’d like to let others know about them.  Prior to working with angels, I was unemployed, physically ill, and going through a very painful divorce.   Every area of my life was in crisis!  Now I am happy, the founder of a growing company, and life is truly magical.  You can find out more about me and my work here: http://healingpowers.net/

What the book is about:

This book is about angels, what they are, how they communicate with us, and how we can ask for and receive their help. This book is designed for anyone who wants to improve their life.  You don’t have to have a particular spiritual belief or faith to read this book!  It really is designed as a practical manual for how to work with angels.

 

Publishing budget for:

Professional editing of the manuscript, cover photo and design by Penny O photography, and printing by the Tattered Cover Press and formatting of the book in ebook formats for the kindle and other ereaders (mobi and epub format).This budget covers getting the book print-ready, printing, and epublishing only.  Every dollar we raise above the $1,000 budget will be used for marketing and traveling to promote the book. 

 

The angels and I thank you for your support!

  

The Impact

This will help me get this book out faster and with specific funds for marketing.  My self-published book Life and the After-Life: Notes from a Medium and Angel Communicator has been successfully self- published and I learned a great deal the first go around that will help this process go more smoothly.  The information in this book is valuable and sure to help those who read it, thank you for helping me get this information out there!  I have used the tools I have learned and taught in this book to increase my income more than 5 times in a year, manifest travel, relationships and so much more!

You can find my last book on Amazon here.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help me get the word out, share on facebook etc!  Ask the angels to help me (really it works!).

Thanks in advance to everyone for their support.

story:
Story of My Book

Young Adult Life: Navigating the Best and Worst Years contains stories from everyday people navigating young adult life and mental health. This book was made to be your friend in times of loneliness and in times of growth.

My name is Colleen Finney, and I am the author of Young Adult Life: Navigating the Best and Worst Years. I wrote this book because throughout my own mental health journey, I read many self-help books that made me feel like what I was going through wasn’t acceptable or okay. They made me feel like an alien and often gave me a three-step guide to changing my life. It never worked and made me feel worse. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that there are many people your age dealing with similar struggles. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for navigating the highs and lows of life as well as the stigma behind mental health. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you not feel alone in the worst times and to use the advice given by everyday people in the best times. 

In this book, you'll learn about many mental health topics and how people worked through them, as well as the struggles people deal with every day and the advice they give to get to the other side of the tunnel. You'll hear stories about:

Being in relationships and going through breakups as a young adult.

Breaking down your childhood trauma and seeing how it sets the foundation for the rest of your life. 

How depression can consume you and what it can teach you in the long run.

You will love this book if you have dealt with the highs and lows of life, struggles throughout your own mental health journey, or just need to feel like you’re not alone. 

Young Adult Life: Navigating the Best and Worst Years is a nonfiction book that speaks to young adults and people juggling mental health who want to look at mental health topics surrounding people, moments, and internal struggles in a new way.

The Book — Young Adult Life: Navigating the Best and Worst Years

The book is written in three parts.

Part 1 (People) contains the introduction and chapters Family Isn’t Everything, Relationships: the good, the bad, & the ugly, and Friends: they come and go. This section covers the outside source of mental health that you can’t control: other people. This section includes stories of being in relationships and going through breakups, as well as weird family dynamics and the trauma they can cause. 

Part 2 (Moments) contains chapters Childhood Trauma: the foundation of it all, The Best and Worst Years of Your Life, and “That will never happen to me.” This section covers the moments in your life that have a lasting impact on your past, present, and future. This section includes stories about how childhood trauma affects the rest of your life and my own story about being sexually assaulted. 

Part 3 (Internal Struggles) contains chapters Normalizing Depression, The Power of Support with Depression, The Fear of the Unknown: exciting, but oh so scary, Accepting Living with the Impossible, Therapy and Seeking Help and the Conclusion. This section covers the biggest part of mental health: the mental part. It includes everything that affects you internally and the world around you. This section includes stories from others about their struggles with depression and anxiety, as well as the ups and downs of living with an illness or diagnosis. 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs of publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December of 2021.

The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter. 

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).

You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

Campaign Goals

Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition

About the Author

Colleen Finney is an aspiring broadcast journalist who just recently graduated from the University of Kentucky and is on the hunt for her first “big girl” job!

During her time at UK, she published many blogs about her struggles with depression and mental health, and the feedback she received was alarming! She knew then that someday she wanted to write a book that was the friend her blog post had been for others. She is also very passionate about mental health and wants to help change the stigma behind it. She thinks it’s time we start talking about our feelings and struggles because they are the things that make us human. 

Outside of this book, she is your average, everyday young adult trying to figure out life, just like the rest of you. She still goes to therapy and is very much still trying to figure out what makes her feel alive and what drags her down. She loves spending time with her friends and family and making memories any way she can. 

For more information, you can connect with Colleen at cefinney99@gmail.com and on social media!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_colllleeeen_/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/colleen.finney.3/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_colllleeeen_
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/colleen-finney/

story:
WHAT IS “AND JUSTICE FOR ART – VOLUME 2”?

My name is Ramón ‘Oscuro’ Martos, and I write for several Heavy Metal publications around the world—including MetalUnderground.com, This Is Metal Magazine, and PureGrainAudio.com. I’m also the author of the book series “...And Justice For Art: Stories About Heavy Metal Album Covers."

The first “...And Justice For Art” book was published in 2015 and was universally praised as a unique collection of graphics, stories, and interviews about the making of some of the greatest album covers in the history of Heavy Metal music. The first edition was put together thanks to the generosity of many artists, bands and fans who helped finance the book through a successful Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign.

I have spent the last three years putting together the second book in the series, titled “…And Justice For Art – Volume 2,” which is now finished and ready to be printed.

The book's 254 color pages contain more than 500 graphics and 100+ band/artist interviews. This volume continues the deed of delving into the stories behind some of heavy music’s most iconic and important album graphics—including legendary recordings like Judas Priest’s “Sad Wings Of Destiny,” Black Sabbath’s “Heaven And Hell,” Slayer’s “Hell Awaits,” King Diamond’s “Them,” Queensryche’s “Operation: Mindcrime,” Sodom’s “Agent Orange,” Cannibal Corpse’s “Tomb Of The Mutilated,” Type Of Negative’s “Bloody Kisses,” Testament’s “Practice What You Preach,” Control Denied’s “The Fragile Art Of Existence,” Satyricon’s “Nemesis Divina,” Death’s “The Sound Of Perseverance,” Meshuggah’s “obZen,” Metallica’s “Metallica,” Soulfly’s “Archangel,” Hate Eternal’s “Infernus,” Gorguts’ “Pleiades’ Dust,” Pallbearer’s “Foundations Of Burden,” Emperor’s “In the Nightside Eclipse,” At The Gates’ “At War With Reality,” and many, many others.

Some of the musicians that provided exclusive interviews and comments for the book are: KK Downing (Judas Priest), Dave Lombardo (Slayer), Jeff Walker (Carcass), Eric Rutan (Hate Eternal), Øystein G. Brun (Borknagar), Hansi Kürsch (Blind Guardian), Eric Peterson (Testament), Brann Dailor (Mastodon), Chris Barnes (Six Feet Under), Satyr (Satyricon), Anders Nyström (Bloodbath), Tomi Koivusaari (Amorphis), Jamey Jasta (Hatebreed), Luc Lemay (Gorguts), Ihsahn/Samoth (Emperor) and visual artists like Eliran Kantor, Dan Seagrave, Paolo Girardi, Mark Wilkinson, Travis Smith, Mattias Frisk, Joachim Luetke, Valnoir among others.

The book’s Foreword was written by legendary Metal musician, Max Cavalera (Soulfly/ex-Sepultura/Cavalera Conspiracy). In addition, “And Justice For Art – Volume 2” features an Afterword by prolific visual artist, Costin Chioreanu (At The Gates, Enslaved, Arcturus), who also painted the book’s stunning cover illustration.

The book will be available ONLY through this fund-raising campaign. Check out a brief preview of the book’s printed prototype in the video above.

WHAT WE NEED

“…And Justice For Art – Vol.2” is completed and ready to be manufactured. I have spent more than $3,000.00 of my own money doing research, securing the use of some images, and designing the book’s layout. Sadly, I’ve reached a point where my limited financial resources are just not enough. To print this publication, some additional funds are needed. This will allow the printing process to follow the industry's highest quality standards—the same quality applied to the first “And Justice For Art” book. Printing a volume like this (with 254 glossy, color pages) is quite expensive, and the cost of keeping this quality has increased dramatically since the last time we printed the previous book.

I truly believe that this is a great opportunity for you and me to make history together. If we join forces, we can bring “And Justice For Art – Vol.2” to life. Your support through this crowd-funding campaign will help raise the rest of the money needed to print the book. The specific amount being asked will allow us to produce a considerable amount of copies—between 500 and 1000, depending on the raised amount—without sacrificing high quality printing standards.

Ideally, I would like to raise $13.447.00 (Dollars). This will be used for:

$10.447.00 for PRINTING 

$3000.00 for SHIPPING MATERIALS (Boxes, Padded Envelopes, Shipping Tape, Bubble Wrap, etc.)  to SHIP THE BOOKS AND PERKS TO READERS/BACKERS.                         

Even if the campaign’s goal is not met, I will make sure to use any amount we raise to print as many copies as possible. This will allow the information contained in the book to reach as many fans/readers as possible. That’s the ultimate goal of this project.

WHAT YOU GET

The perks offered to those who support this project are worth the commitment. As happened in the first book’s campaign, many contributors will have the opportunity of having their names included in the book’s Thank You credits. Also, some of the bands and artists featured in the book have donated really cool items for the campaign—including merchandise and signed memorabilia, etc.

All the perks include FREE shipping. For more information, feel free to check the complete list of perks. Most perks/books will ship around October, 2018.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Even if you are not interested or can’t collaborate, you can be a part of this. You can share the news about this campaign with the rest of the world via Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media. Even one Share, Tweet or Like could make the difference. You can also follow the book’s development and find out more news about album covers via ...And Justice For Art’s Facebook community: https://www.facebook.com/andjusticeforart/  or the official blog www.andjusticeforart.com

If you have any additional questions about the perks, about this campaign, or have any other queries, please contact Ramon ‘Oscuro’ Martos at: andjusticeforart@gmail.com

THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT AND KEEP IT METAL!

story:
Cable, the Novel:

Based on the actual dramatic construction of the iconic Golden Gate Bridge, Cable is a deeply powerful story of struggle, brotherhood, love, and the triumph of the human spirit. 

Cable captures the story of the bridge workers suspended high above the surface of the world... laying catwalks, lifting saddles, spinning cables, securing a far-reaching roadway over the bay...in the wind, ice, and fog… always just one careless step from death.  Cable tells of their work and their lives and their loves… creating a monument to themselves and their nation.

The story rides on gritty atmosphere and sharp-edged encounters, centering on characters with great depth, many of them barely surviving the hard life. 

Introduction:

In the early 1930s, the people of San Francisco decided to do something impossible… they decided to build a bridge across the Golden Gate Strait.  All they needed was a design, money,  steel -- and men.

The experts planned for at least 35 deaths… but the men came anyway.  From across the nation they came… world-famous engineers, steel workers, unemployed musicians, construction workers, Okie farmers, and highway builders … heroes and cowards… saints and sinners… they came to San Francisco to build a bridge.

These men built one of the most beautiful and iconic structure in the world.  Millions of people come each year to revel in the beauty of this architectural wonder.  Yet, surprisingly, not much is known about the men who actually built this magnificent bridge.


The story:

                 

                 


In 1935, a young man, Tony Wright, leaves his home in Oklahoma one step ahead of the Sheriff after losing his wife in child-birth and his farm to foreclosure.  He arrives in San Francisco, penniless, friendless, jobless, and in deep despair.

By chance, he is hired to work on the Golden Gate Bridge construction as part of an elite team of cable-layers. He quickly learns that on the high reaches of the emerging bridge, his very life depends on his skills and on his crew-mates. 

The crew includes five strong men… different from each other in background, temperament, beliefs, and dreams… and yet linked together by their work and their desire to survive.

Each man is building a new bridge and a new life… with new friends and new enemies…loves found and lost… a growing sense of purpose and confidence.  And all the while, they each know that one tiny misstep will end it all.

While each man explores his own destiny, they find themselves bound to the Bridge and to each other.


The Cabling Crew: 

                               


·  Will “Boss” Henry – The cable crew foreman hand-picked and sent from New Jersey to direct one of the most important and dangerous jobs on the Bridge.  Will’s entire life is focused on his work… until the night he hears a terrifying scream for help.

·  Bobby “Rooster” D'Agostino – Strongly chiseled, skilled, and proudly Italian with a violent history not far behind.  His temper and abrasive personality make him feared and unpopular.  His cockiness has rightly earned him the nickname Rooster.  He yearns for the prestige and power of being a foreman, but a new crew member from Oklahoma stands in his way.

·  Leroy “Blaze” Johnson – Experienced, tough, quiet, and black. Blaze works hard and tries to be a team player, but his past and growing racial tensions threaten to release the explosive power he just manages to keep out of sight.

·  Nathan “Yorkie” Goldman – A Jewish New Yorker who loves music and the trumpet and has an unexpected talent for humor.  Somewhat reticent and shy, he is lanky-strong and quick.  He moves like a cat, but he has a closely guarded personal secret.

·  Tony “Okie” Wright – Smart and artistic but emotionally and physically beaten by life and loss, Tony has recently arrived from Oklahoma desperately looking for a job, any job - what he finds may be a new life and a new love… if he can survive.


The Vision:

The Cable story is the vision of Don Propstra, who has lived in San Francisco for the last several decades.  Don has a track record of doing inspirational projects and this is his latest creative endeavor.

"The Golden Gate Bridge is beloved the world over.  It embodies a spirit of beauty and equanimity that leaves me and many others in rapt awe. 

I have often wondered about the men who built this glorious bridge. These men are the true artists and heroes who have given us the gift of the magnificent Golden Gate Bridge. 

In honor of these men, I set out to write a historical fiction novel Cable, an odyssey that weaves the Great Depression, Dust Bowl, the turbulent 1930s, and the aching growth of these young men into a story that captures the drama and spirit of these times." 

                    


What is Needed Now:

During the past several years, I have done extensive research,  met with individuals who recounted original stories, explored historically significant sites. Then, I created the Cable characters, developed the story line, and began writing the novel. 

Now that the novel is almost finished, it is time to prepare for publication. The support of a New York Times Best Selling Editorial Team has been enlisted to  guide Cable  through the final phase.  

Until now, Cable has been self-funded.  In order to complete the final phase of this creative writing project, I am reaching out for donations.  $25,000 is needed to:

·  Complete the Cable manuscript

·  Work with a seasoned editorial team

·  Prepare internet, social media, and marketing materials

·  Retain an agent and publisher, and

·  Release the first printing of the novel.


Gifts For You...

I have thoroughly enjoyed creating, researching, and writing Cable. To thank you for supporting my  project at this time, I have put together an array of San Francisco themed perks which surely will indulge you in the beauty and the spirit of the Golden Gate Bridge. Your donations are welcome on any and every level!

Thank you for helping me build this bridge!

story:
About Outlook Springs Magazine

Outlook Springs is a biannual, print-and-online literary journal based in Outlook Springs, New Hampshire, a quiet little town in an alternate dimension. Our mission is simple: we want to publish the best fiction, poetry, and non-fiction from all nooks and crannies of Space/Time. Readers and writers alike will shape the mythology and history of the town by voting in town elections, writing news stories, submitting patents for various inter-dimensional inventions, etc.

Founded in the summer of 2015 by Andrew Mitchell, a graduate of the MFA-Fiction program at the University of New Hampshire, and Nathaniel Parker Raymond, an artist and designer based out of Portsmouth, NH, Outlook Springs has already received hundreds of submissions from exciting new voices all over the world (and other worlds, too).

Now we need your help to publish Issue #1 in April 2016!

What We Need & What You Get

  • Outlook Springs charges no submission fees (we believe money should move toward artists, not away from them!) and we pay all of our writers. Because we're so new, and because the citizens of Outlook Springs recently voted down an Art Tax in favor of Free Pumpkin Pie for All,  public funding is crucial to our success. Each contribution, no matter the size, will help launch both the magazine and the town itself into the universe.
  • Some of our costs include but are not limited to: Printing. Paying Writers. Submission Management (Submittable).  Building and maintaining our website. Design. Advertising. Disabling hexes concealed within the wordwork. (Update: Glob Tobbleson's Hextermination Inc. has generously donated their services to our magazine. Thanks, Glob!) None of these funds will be used to pay us, the editors. 
  • There are thousands of great literary magazines out there in the Great Big World Hive. So why should you contribute to Outlook Springs? Distinctions between genre are collapsing (good!) and our goal is to collapse them even further. Our aesthetic emphasis is language and character. Everything that excites our editors is welcome in our town and magazine: minimalism, maximilism, slipstream, experimental, magical realism, etc.
  • We shy away from the academic-side of literary publishing. Instead, we strive to publish a magazine booby-trapped with the bizarre. In addition to all the tremendous writing packed inside each issue, you will find: coupons to some of the local establishments around town; posters from films only released at the downtown Film-O-Plex (including the classic "Moon Tuba"); advertisements for inter-dimensional products; etc.
  • We want each issue to be a strange, unpredictable, entertaining descent into various Word Worlds, and we want the magazine itself (and the history of the town!) to change and grow with our readers and writers.

OK, get to the loot: PERKS! (Note: Every contributor will be included as a citizen and benefactor of Outlook Springs in the Inaugural Issue.)

  • "Proud Citizen of Outlook Springs" sticker
  • "Read Interdimensional Books" bumper sticker
  • Interdimensional Travel Permit
  • Issue 1 of Outlook Springs
  • Discounted Subscription (1 year) to Outlook Springs
  • Outlook Springs T-shirts
  • Poster Print of "Moon Tuba"
  • Mystery Box filled by Outlook Springs mayor, Judy Hernandez
  • Seats on the 7th Council (Yes, our local government is rather corrupt)
  • AND MORE!

T-SHIRTS

STICKERS

POSTERS

MYSTERY BOX!

OH YEAH, THAT MAGAZINE THING

Other Ways You Can Help

Is money tight? We totally understand. You can still help! Share our page on Facebook and Twitter, let others know who might be interested, etc. Either way, your support means the world (many worlds!) to us.

story:
Goal Achieved!!!!  Thank you! Together we have raised over $800 for Special Olympics Nebraska!

And we're not done yet...you can still support the project by ordering your own copy today!

 

Story of My Book

Hard Work Is Not Enough is a book about developing the soft-skills required to be more believable, strategic, and influential at work.

I am Jeff Shannon, the author of Hard Work Is Not Enough. I wrote this book because I listened to advice claiming that to move up in the organization, all you had to do was become an expert in your field and work harder than anyone else. As many managers and aspiring leaders do, I quickly learned this approach builds a reputation of dependability, but dependability doesn’t equal influence. I felt stuck until I realized I needed to change my strategy.

My hope for this book is to help you increase your influence with your team and organization. It’s a book filled with stories of people just like you and me who became experts and worked hard to end up frustrated when what got them there wouldn’t get them where they wanted to be. They had to transform themselves by building the often overlooked soft skills to reach their highest potential.

  • How to know when it’s time to change your career strategy
  • How letting some fires burn can lead to greater productivity
  • How your instincts might be making you a bad people manager

Hard Work Is Not Enough is a nonfiction book that speaks to people managers and aspiring leaders who want to look at leadership and influence differently to achieve different and better results.

Part 2 is about transforming your thinking (chapters 4-7). I synthesize years of leading businesses and helping companies build strategy into principles and frameworks to help you think strategically.

What I Need & What You’ll Get

Jeff is husband to Jen and father to Brady and Mallory. He spends a lot of time shooting hoops in the driveway, reminding others to do their chores, and turning off the lights. For international pre-orders, please send me a private message.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,

Jeff Shannon

Story of My Book

How to Make the Matriarchy - My journey to answer the question: can we achieve gender equality in my lifetime, and what will it take to get there?

My name is Maureen Devine-Ahl and I am the author of How to Make the Matriarchy. I wrote this book because I could never quite find my place in the battle cry of Smash the Patriarchy. Instead of rooting in destruction and rage, I was curious and wondered, what if we were rooted in vision and potential? What does a more gender-balanced society look like? Who in the world can offer clues to getting there? What are the biggest remaining barriers standing in the way? And most importantly, how can I take steps to enable this new future?

My hope is that, in reading this book, you’ll join me in exploring the inspiring stories, cautionary tales, and takeaway lessons on what it will take to build a more gender-balanced future. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same passion and excitement I have for the potential of empowering women to build a newer, more inclusive society. I have learned so much on this journey, including everyday actions I can take to shift the culture and impact the future. I ultimately want you to see this book as a tool to help you discover ways in which you can do the same.

In this book, you'll learn about the places in the world that have made great gains in gender equality, what we can learn from them, and how they influence what I define as the four key areas we must focus on to move forward, such as:
 
  • How Rwanda came to be ranked #1 in the world for parliamentary representation by women, and how installing more women in leadership has led to major gains in equality in a relatively short period of time.
  • How the coronavirus pandemic, while providing stark evidence of the effectiveness of female leaders, can either serve as an accelerant for knocking down some of our biggest gender barriers, or a tremendous threat to erasing decades of gains made in gender equality.
  • Details behind how Nordic countries have made great gains in closing gender gaps, and how strategies to empower women and reduce dependency end up benefiting not just women, but entire societies, making them some of the happiest places in the world to live.
You will love this book if you're passionate about gender equality, or even just willing to learn more. You will love this book if you're curious about what big or small everyday things you can do to empower current and future generations to build a more equitable and inclusive society.
 

The Book - How to Make the Matriarchy

The book is written in Three Parts....
  • In part 1 we get rooted in the status of women around the world: the good, the bad, and the ugly. We explore a handful of existing matriarchal societies, where they are, and the surprising things we can learn about them. We’ll dig in to the data of which countries are some of the best in the world for women and gender equality in general, and set the stage for what we can learn from them.
  • In part 2, our learning journey begins to resemble a puzzle in progress, identifying the “corners” my research shows are some of the biggest barriers standing in the way of achieving gender equality. We explore the “pieces” within those corners, with the idea that if each of us picks a few pieces to make changes in our own lives, we could begin to assemble the puzzle that represents a society no longer about power over others (patriarchy), but the power of inclusion (my definition of the matriarchy).
  • In part 3, I’ll share what changes I’m committing to making after this learning journey. We’ll explore the dangers of backsliding- how progress is not finite and how we need to continue to protect the progress already made, while continue to work towards more.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in [December, 2020]
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this [winter]
  • When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.
I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

About the Author

Maureen Devine-Ahl is on a mission to change the world. Maureen has spent her career working in the non-profit industry in various roles fundraising, leading, and change-making. She’s passionate about the power of social change.

Maureen wrote this book because she was genuinely curious if achieving equality for women in her lifetime is possible, and if so, how she can contribute to making it happen. Maureen was having trouble resonating with the rallying cry of “smash the patriarchy”, and she found herself wondering what it would look like if, instead of focusing on destroying the systems we loathe, we focused on what we could create in their place.

When she’s not writing, leading, and changing the world, she’s baking, reading, and surviving mom life to one two-legged human and one four-legged canine.

For more information you can connect with Maureen at maureenkdevine@gmail.com, on LinkedIn, and on Instagram @makethematriarchy.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #makethematriarchy and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Maureen Devine-Ahl

I look at companies and the mindset it takes to start the momentum and better yet sustain it! I have seen life change for business and people alike when they embody our 7 exclusive steps to start and sustain momentum.

In this book, we'll bust the myth that momentum is luck and study the foundation of momentum. We will also:

Teach you how to simplify your life, increase your productivity, and reach your goals by utilizing our 7 steps.  

Hear from elite performers in organizations that utilized momentum to achieve extraordinary success in their career. From SuperBowl winning Wide Receiver Jordan Norwood to Nate Barton of the Blue Angels.


You will love this book because it will help you IMMEDIATELY unlock momentum in any business or leadership role.

This book is great for upcoming leaders, CEOs and business owners.

The book is written in 2 Parts....

Part 1 contains the introduction + 4 chapters each describing a different component of starting momentum. The foundation of awareness/mindset like President and CEO Stephen Klasko had as he took a $1 billion organization to almost $6 billion in 5 years. We look at his story in the book.

Part 2 contains Chapters 5-8 showing once you start momentum how you sustain it. We dive into an interview with former Blue Angel Nate Barton to see how the best in the world measure and adjust for success once they have organizational momentum.

And more...

His approach is the perfect blend of mindset work combined with a strategy in an 8-week online course that includes LIVE coaching. Seth holds an Executive MBA from Villanova University, is a mentor to MBA students, board member, and author to the upcoming book (Dec 2020) Momentum: The investment you’ve been missing.”

story:
Love,
    Serica  by Serica Emani Weaver

Hi, my name is Serica Emani Weaver and I am the author of a book about self-empowerment, leadership, healing, resilience, and the importance of creating healthy dialogue while finding your voice as a woman of color. I was inspired to write this book after losing a loved one and reaching a dark place in my life, struggling with my faith, and finding my voice and passion.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will open your minds to new perspectives, providing an opportunity for growth, wisdom, and strength to become more in touch and in tune with who you are. I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for breaking the mold. I want my vulnerability to ignite yours. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you share your thoughts, fears, and life experiences. We all offer different perspectives from our continually changing life’s plan. I want you to open your eyes to the beauty that lies inside, creating healthy dialogue in times of uncertainty.

In this book, you'll explore  the intersections of:

  • healing and resilience
  • love and passion
  • growth and vulnerability

You will love this book if you have ever felt like an underdog, struggled with loss, self love, or finding your passion and voice.

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2020 
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author

My journey with self-love, faith, and challenges in life led me to write this book. As a graduate from Savannah College of Art and Design, I have been fascinated by the opportunity to hone my creative abilities while striving to change the way people see the world of design. In every design project, I take on the challenge to foster a diversified worldview with an eclectic style and focus on social needs. My passion for people and design allows a unique perspective when communicating my challenges in this book.

For more information you can connect with Serica at sericaweaver@outlook.com and Ig: @sunny_sunflowerr

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #LoveSerica and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Warmest Regards,
Serica Weaver

story:
The Adventures of Zammy the GIANT Sheepadoodle

A wholesome illustrated children’s book based on the adventures of the real-life GIANT therapy dog named Zammy – a HUGE-hearted pup whose job is to simply “spread joy” to all his friends!

        Zam·my \ ˈza-mē \ verb \ To spread joy. \ #zambassadorofjoy

 
 

Overview

With over 150,000 Instagram following friends, Zammy has become beloved worldwide (@zammypup). Many friends suggested the creation of a children’s book based on the larger-than-life Sheepadoodle, Zammy. Friends encouraged; I accepted the challenge!

My name is Todd Pitner, Zammy’s owner. I have a good bit of insight into children’s books. With four amazing daughters, I’m practiced in the joy of reading bedtime stories. When imagining a Zammy book, there were three MUST HAVES: 1) Zammy would truly need to appear as a GIANT, lovable best friend. 2) His adventures would be shared with characters inspired by real-life friends we’ve met while spreading joy at the Shriners Hospital for Children. 3) The story will be embedded with fundamental core values important to help young readers develop strong character.

About This Campaign

This book, MEET ZAMMY’S NEW FRIENDS, has already been written and illustrated. This 3-week campaign commencing on Thanksgiving Day is to secure the $5,000 in support needed to fund the print production for a paperback, hard cover and an eBook for the 2019 holidays. This campaign is for backers passionate about Zammy, the joy he spreads and the positive daily impact he makes worldwide.

What We Need & What You Get

There is a myriad of details involved in publishing a high-quality illustrated book (and being able to ship worldwide). The backer’s support will help pay for the print production and shipping expenses of the first book and, should we surpass our goal, will also support the design, editing, proofreading, layout and the art illustrations for the second book (the series will be nine total books).

MEET ZAMMY’S FRIENDS will be full-color 8” x 8” square book, available as:

              Ebook:  $10

              Paperback:  $25 - shipping included

              Hardcover:  $50 - shipping included

              The Zammy Special:  $100 - shipping included *

* The Zammy Special is simply about support – for backers who “can” afford to invest a higher amount which will truly make this project come to life. All Zammy Special backers will receive the hardcover version, eBook, t-shirt and a GIANT Zammy poster!

About Zammy

  • Sheepadoodle: ½ Old English Sheepdog + ½ XL Standard Poodle
  • Children’s Hospital for Children Therapy Dog (Tampa, Florida)
  • Voted FLOOFIEST DOG OF INSTAGRAM
  • Born December 17, 2015
  • Stands 5-1/2 feet tall
  • Weighs 120 pounds
  • LOVES anyone and everyone
  • Featured on The Dodo, 9gag, UNILAD, Buzzfeed Animals,
    LADBible, The Today Show & Reddit
  • A must-follow on Instagram @zammypup

story:
Short Summary

Mental Frameworks For The Modern Revolution is about how to change our mental frameworks to get us onto a pathway towards creating a better world and coming to grips with the fact that no matter your view on the world, if you want to create real change externally it starts with understanding the change that has to get done internally.

My name is Ariane and I am the author of Mental Frameworks for our Modern Revolution: Change Your Mind if you want to Change The World. I wrote this book because the conversation around the problems in our country and the changes that need to be made are incredibly pertinent at the moment and I believe the conversation about the inner mental work that everyone has to do to contribute to our better future is missing from a lot of the conversations around advocacy and activism.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that your current mental frameworks might not be conducive to systematic change and you come to understand how many problems in the world are a reflections of our mental framework limitations. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for the possibility for each of us to implement change in the world by working to change ourselves. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you get a better nuanced view on the world around you and what it means to change it.

In this book, you'll learn about what it means to change your mental framework, specifically focusing on three mindsets that I believe are particularly important to be changed and aren't being addressed in general activism and advocacy: our relationship with history, our perceptions of different places in this country and the people who inhabit them, and finally, how we view things through the lens of a binary of one thing vs. another.

This book explores these topics through the minds and lives of people living and studying them. You’ll learn how a professor came to realize what it meant to valuably teach history, how a psychologist applies theories of evolutionary psychology to the world we live in today, and how a Rabbi realized their community had broken into “sides.” You’ll hear from regular college students about what it means to be a progressive in our generation when you come from the midwest, the south, the west coast, and the northeast.

Mental Frameworks for the Modern Revolution is a nonfiction book that speaks to activists, people involved in advocacy, or just somebody who wants to see change in our county

Mental Frameworks for the Modern Revolution: Change Your Mind if you Want To Change The World is divided into 3 parts:

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1 and 2. In this part of the book I explain what inspired to me write about my topic, and I explain what a ‘mental framework’ really is and what it means to actually change it.

Part 2 contains chapters 3-8. This part details the three mental frameworks I believe we each need to reexamine. Our relationship with history, perceptions of different parts of the US, and the way our minds are drawn to understanding things as a binary of one thing vs. another.

Part 3 contains chapters 9 and 10. This part of the book is my final call to action and conclusion. I talk about the reason why I believe this change is possible and how powerful it can be to know that you, individually, are capable of changing the world simply by changing your mind.   

 

What I Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring.
When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Ariane is a political communications undergraduate student. She is currently living in DC, taking a gap year from college to pursue career goals in the field of politics. As of now, has worked as an intern at The Massachusetts Women’s Political Caucus, Public Citizen, Rock The Vote, and End Citizens United.

Ariane has always been interested in understanding the human condition. With a passion in psychology, a love for reading and writing, and career goals in politics, there is nothing that is more fascinating to her than trying to untangle the utterly complex makeups of humanity and our society. So when the year of 2020 came to be, and the world and everyone in it changed, seemingly forever, Ariane all of a sudden found herself with lots of time to be reflective of what it really means to be a part of history and what it really takes to create change.

In her free time Ariane likes to go on excessively long walks, doll out opinions no one asks for, paint despite having zero artistic talents, and harbor an intense love for coffee with more milk and sugar than coffee.

For more information, you can connect with Ariane Ivanier at ariane.ivanier1@gmail.com and at @ariane.i on Instagram.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #ChangeYourMindChangeTheWorld and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Ariane

story:
The Story of My Book

Two Fish in a Tank: How Jokes May Save Our Fractured World is an exploration of how comedy has been critical to success and perseverance during some of the darkest times in human history.

My name is Zev Burton and I am the author of Two Fish in a Tank: How Jokes May Save Our Fractured World. I wrote this book because I kept hearing about the role of comedy in international affairs in classes, but I couldn’t find a book on the subject — so I wrote my own!

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how comedy plays a necessary and important role in our globalized (yet fractured) world. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for the practical uses of humor to bring the world together. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you understand how humor is critical to overcoming our greatest struggles as individuals, as communities, and as a world.

In this book, you'll learn about international affairs and the role of humor. You'll hear stories such as...

  • A North Korean Diplomat known for his jokes
  • How a comedy play in Ancient Greece stopped a war
  • A Czech community using humor to combat their Nazi Oppressors

You will love this book if you are a fan of politics, a fan of history, or just like to laugh!

Two Fish in a Tank: How Jokes May Save Our Fractured World is a nonfiction book that speaks to comedy-lovers and politics-lovers who want to look at the role of humor and international relations in a new way.

 

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring!

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish it.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Zev is currently studying International Security, Russian, and Mathematics at Georgetown University in Washington, D.C. He is deeply passionate about helping keep people safe from threats — and he’s fascinated by discovering unique ways to help make the world more peaceful.

Zev wrote this book because, as a lover of comedy (read: failed stand-up comedian), he began to wonder about the practical uses of comedy. Feeling dissatisfied with the seriousness of the international affairs world, he began an in-depth exploration of how comedy and humor shape our world. Combined with his academic research and study of international affairs, he began to realize how important and under-discussed the role of humor is in the world of international relations.

A lifelong learner, Zev divides his non-academic time between watching baseball, writing for a humor blog (zevburton.com/the-hilarity-of-it-all) and reading the latest Washington D.C. tell-all. But when he’s back home in Indiana, he can be found playing fetch with his dog, Vader, for hours on end.

For more information, you can connect with Zev at zb111@georgetown.edu and at www.zevburton.com. You can also connect with Zev on Twitter (@zevburton), on Instagram (@zevulous), and on LinkedIn (www.linkedin.com/in/zevburton)

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #TwoFishInaTank and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Zev Burton

story:
It is with gratitude, excitement, and a feeling of accomplishment that I’m happy to announce that my campaign goal has now been fully funded due to additional outside funding! I would like to thank my friends, family, colleagues, interviewees, and the New Degree Press team for coming together to support me on this endeavor. I couldn’t have done this without you every single one of you! For those who have supported, you will get update emails regarding cover designs and the remaining timeline until launch!

 

 

Story of My Book

 

The Innovative Mindset is about how entrepreneurs have defied the status quo and started and grown successful companies with the right mindset/tools.

My name is Sameer Gupta, and I am the author of the Innovative Mindset. I wrote this book because I believe that it can be very easy to conform to peer’s expectations in the modern age. Many people feel they cannot pursue their entrepreneurial or otherwise creative ambitions for various reasons. These can be financial, time or social constraints. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how startups have grown to become successful not only because of the product/services they offer but also because the mindset their founders embody. I want to share the different tools that will equip you with the resources to become successful in your personal and professional life.

In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for startups, growing companies, and novel/innovative ideas in you.  Ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you start your own venture.

In this book, you'll learn about:

  • Why failure is important with Joshua Anton’s personal story (a true rags to riches story that will keep you on edge)
  • How to develop company culture from Anthony Casalena, Founder of Squarespace 
  • What it’s like to build a product acquired by Apple from Sony Theakanath, Head of Special Products at Apple
  • How to effectively lead a team with Thuan Phan, Chief Technology Officer of Uber
  • Why determination is key from Carlos Vera, Founder of Pay Our Interns (fun fact, his team successfully pushed Congress to pass $31 million in funding for Congressional interns!)
  • How to sell your product from Tim Brown, Founder of All Birds


You will love this book if you are motivated and interested in learning how successful companies grow and succeed. You don’t need to have an idea or a company to gain from reading this book. You will benefit as along as you practice some of the skills I outline.

The Innovative Mindset is a non-fiction book that speaks to undergraduate students and entrepreneurial-minded folks who are looking to start or grow their companies or simply learn how to organize their time efficiently.

 

The Book - The Innovative Mindset

 

The book is written in 3 parts.

Part one contains an introduction and chapters one and two. In this part, you will learn about the landscape we currently live in and how that is affecting the risk individuals take. I will dive a little deeper into what challenge is and why you should challenge yourself.

Part two contains chapters three through six. In these chapters, I outline four principles with several supporting examples you can start thinking about in order to change the way you go about your personal and professional business. Using well-known psychology concepts, expert opinions, personal research, and interviews, I explore and reveal how individuals prioritize their time and change their mindsets for the better; I have used common brands like Dyson technologies and Starbucks to elucidate some of these principles in a digestible fashion. 

Part three contains chapters seven through nine and a conclusion. Within these chapters, I illustrate how founders and successful people in business have utilized the principles outlined in previous chapters. I show you how a behemoth like Apple acquires a small startup founded by undergraduates at UC Berkeley. I show you how a University of Virginia undergraduate founded a multi-million dollar data company, a true rags to riches story. I take all the concepts and skills outlined earlier in the book and make them real with living, breathing and laughing people!

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Summer


When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will publish!

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • If you pre-order now, you will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish along with
  • A personal handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author


Sameer Gupta is a 3rd-year undergraduate at the University of Virginia studying Economics and Entrepreneurship. He decided to write this book because he has always been curious about how people start successful companies and rise to the top. He is passionate about startups and new companies developing innovative and groundbreaking products. This is because he feels these types of companies have the most potential to disrupt antiquated industries and impact the lives of millions of people for the better. He is curious to see how startups become well-oiled machines poised for success.

Whether it is a family party, coffee shop, or dinner out, Sameer is fearless in talking to random people in hopes of making new connections and learning something new. He enjoys serendipitous conversations such as those with the person drinking coffee next to him. He comes from Springfield, a small town in Northern Virginia. If you don't find him studying for class or vibing with friends, you will be sure to find him eating/cooking (one of his favorite things to do). He has a deep-rooted penchant for asian inspired food. Thai, Chinese, Taiwanese, and Indian food ‘keep him on his toes!’

For more information you can connect with Sameer at sg4vh@virginia.edu, Instagram @sam_g98, or Linkedln @https://www.linkedin.com/in/sameer-gupta-ba9a2587/

 

Risks & Challenges

 

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. I'm aware that supporting me financially isn't feasible for everyone, and that is 100% understandable. That said, if you still want to support me and this book journey, it would be invaluable to me if you could

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #TheInnovativeMindset and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts!

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it! Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

Thank you so much of all of your love and support! If you have gotten this far in the post, you rock!

Cheers,
Sameer Gupta

story:
Meeresvøgel is a nonprofit creative project with the goal of invoking hopefulness and inspiring others to be more creative, introspective, and active with their surroundings. We strive to help others reflect and to push through the darkness that creeps into the light of our daily lives, highlight perseverance, and feature the benefits of wondering as a positive experience. There’s more light in the surrounding of your life than you may think. Slow down. Breathe in. Notice life in everything.
 
 
The book was originally created back in 2014 to combine travel photos, writing and journaling as a personal reminder to persevere. Over the years, we continued to explore this idea through places traveled, finding ways to push the design, the writing, and how it could possibly be digestible to a wider audience. It was first created so it could lend hope when things felt hopeless, slow-down when life felt it was going too fast, and help others gain new perspective. So here we are in 2018, and I think you'll enjoy how far we've come.
 
 
We're a little different than your average publication.
We're a small 6x8, 90-page book that you can bring with you conveniently, take notes, and reach out to us with your writings and get involved in making a second publication.
 
The Issue:
As mental health becomes more of a transparent issue, it's still stigmatized and pushed under the rug as a taboo topic. Yet 44 million people suffer from a mental illness (anxiety, depression) in the US alone (almost 1 in 5 Americans) and yet no one talks about it. Twenty-percent of your co-workers, your loved ones, the people you know around you are possibly and likely dealing with things they don't talk about because of this ongoing stigma.
 
 
The Cause & The Impact:
As a continued effort to push the topic of Mental Health towards ubiquity, we will be donating 100% of our net-profits to The National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI). NAMI is the nation’s largest grassroots mental health organization dedicated to building better lives for the millions of Americans affected by mental illness.
 

 

How far your contribution will go:

NAMI is offered in thousands of communities across the United States through NAMI State Organizations and NAMI Affiliates, their education programs ensure hundreds of thousands of families, individuals and educators get the support and information they need.

They provides volunteer leaders with the tools, resources and skills necessary to save mental health in all states.

They provide a toll-free NAMI HelpLine allows us to respond personally to hundreds of thousands of requests each year, providing free referral, information and support—a much-needed lifeline for many.

NAMI also holds public awareness events and activities, including Mental Illness Awareness Week and NAMIWalks, successfully fight stigma and encourage understanding. NAMI works with reporters on a daily basis to make sure our country understands how important mental health is.

 

Risks and Challenges:

We've taken quite a bit into consideration into minimizing risks. This book is written, photographed, and is ready to be sent as-is already. If volume for print is larger than expected, please be aware of possible delays associated (will will try to be as transparent as possible with this as well).

NAMI is the nation’s largest grassroots mental health organization dedicated to building better lives for the millions of Americans affected by mental illness.
  How far your contribution will go:
NAMI is offered in thousands of communities across the United States through NAMI State Organizations and NAMI Affiliates, their education programs ensure hundreds of thousands of families, individuals and educators get the support and information they need.
They provides volunteer leaders with the tools, resources and skills necessary to save mental health in all states.
They provide a toll-free NAMI HelpLine allows us to respond personally to hundreds of thousands of requests each year, providing free referral, information and support—a much-needed lifeline for many.
NAMI also holds public awareness events and activities, including Mental Illness Awareness Week and NAMIWalks, successfully fight stigma and encourage understanding. NAMI works with reporters on a daily basis to make sure our country understands how important mental health is.
 
Risks and Challenges:We've taken quite a bit into consideration into minimizing risks. This book is written, photographed, and is ready to be sent as-is already. If volume for print is larger than expected, please be aware of possible delays associated (will will try to be as transparent as possible with this as well).

story:
The 2nd book in the epic series A Song of Ice and Fire: "A Clash of Kings" continues the story started by "A Game of Thrones". Like the first book, "A Clash of Kings" was very well received by fans and critics. 

After the amazing success of our first release, I am excited to continue the progress with book two of this captivating story. Now, you can continue to follow your favorite characters with this amazing rebound edition!

Introducing: "A Clash of Kings" Rebound in a way that only Artem Charta can!  

You've Never Seen Books Like These!

The books we create feature details you won't find anywhere else.   

Each copy features a cast metal nickel plated emblem on the cover. This cast metal emblem is an original piece of artwork inspired by elements of the story. This book, "A Clash of Kings", features a crown of swords based on that worn by Robb Stark as "The King in the North".

Surrounding the cover is a raised cover border. This border not only continues the theme of a three dimensional cover, but also helps to protect the emblem from adjacent books when the volume is on a shelf. The cover material is entirely hand formed over this border, which takes considerable time and guarantees quality.

The spine of each book features a concealed rare earth magnet which holds a small bookmark in the shape of a sword. As with the emblem, each sword design is cast metal, nickel plated, and unique to each book in the series.

 

 

Inside, each book is given a completely new cleat sewn binding, the strongest binding for rebound books of this type. This edition also features deep navy blue end sheets (acting on the feedback from the collectors of our first project!), and red/yellow stripped head and foot bands at the end of the spine.  

 

The beautifully numbered and hubbed spine features a decorative sword inspired by the the world of A Song of Ice and Fire. The sword is securely held in place by a strong rare earth magnet concealed inside the spine. This also served to center the bookmark on the spine in the same place each time you put it away. 

Unmistakable. Even on a shelf.

"A Clash of Kings" Rebound (right) next to our first project ("A Game of Thrones", left)

It is to the support of this growing community that I owe the most sincere appreciation. Those that back our project will have the chance to claim a copy of this amazing edition at the lowest price we have ever offered! 

In order to explain the different reward options, I've outlined them below!

$189 - Only 100 Available!

Our LOWEST price for 1 volume!

By pledging to this reward level, you'll claim your very own copy of this incredible volume of "A Clash of Kings" with all of the amazing features you've seen and read about. The ultimate collector's edition!

 $379 - Only 50 Available! 

SAVE OVER $145!

As a thank you for your amazing support, you will get a copy of our first edition: "A Game of Thrones" AND a copy of our latest project: "A Clash of Kings"!

These are not just fancy slip covers...

Creating one of our editions taken a large amount of labor and craftsmanship. The features we include in our designs do not lend themselves to mass production, and the quality expected of the final product means that hand work is the only option available.

Each book is handled individually throughout the process, from the bespoke new sewn binding, to the amazing features like the hand forming of the cover material. Each feature is carefully considered so that these volumes stand out against any other edition.

Our books start life as trade paperbacks. Trade paperbacks feature beautiful page accents, premium paper stock compared to mass market paperbacks, and the established print quality that we will require of our final product.

The first step is to strip these paperback books down completely until they are simply a stack of loose pages. The old glued spine is completely removed, and the books are ready for the Smyth Cleat sewing process.

A text block in the cleat sewing machine

Cleat sewing gives these books the strongest possible foundation so that they last and last!

Cleat sewn binding schematic and one of our text blocks after sewing

The text blocks are then trimmed to the final dimensions, and any unfinished edges are squared.

Trimming the text block

Trimmed vs untrimmed text block

Meanwhile, the covers are being assembled and made ready to receive the text blocks. This includes the spine magnet, the cover border and emblem, and the title stamping.

Raw materials for building the covers!

Cover awaiting stamping

The press used for stamping and embossing

Image from our previous project "A Game of Thrones" Rebound

Once the text blocks are prepared, and the cover is ready, the two are combined to create the final product!  

"A Clash of Kings" Rebound next to our first project "A Game of Thrones"

The books are proudly rebound here in the United States. This proximity gives us great control over the quality of our books at every stage, and helps to make sure that we stay on top of the entire process.

I've also worked very hard to ensure that nothing about these books takes due credit away from the people who deserve it. Our editions start as trade paperbacks, ensuring that everyone involved in the creation and printing of the book gets their due! We then carefully removing the binding to rebind it to create a unique collector's edition unlike any other. 

I'm not stopping with just one or two books, or even just one series. As I have said before, this will be the first of many titles I plan to undertake. Can you imagine how an entire collection of books like this would look on your bookshelf?

... But in order to get there, I need YOUR HELP! It is your support that will make this grow!

Hi, I'm Michael

I founded Artem Charta (Latin, artem - art; charta – papyrus or paper) with a single goal: redefine what a collector's edition book can be. 

My interest in quality books began when I found myself inside a very large, and very old, private library full of aged and character-filled books and volumes. As I looked around that room, I could imagine the owner sitting by the fireplace late at night, lost in the pages of a book from his collection. The books in that room were works of great quality, and I began to wonder: "Where would I go TODAY to begin building a collection like this?"

I found that it was harder than I thought to find what I was looking for. The more I looked, the more I realized that I wanted something a bit different than what had been done before. I knew that the first hurdle would be negotiating the complicated world of punishing and printing. In order to get past these obstacles, get things started, and ensure I did things by the book (pun intended!), I decided to begin with trade paperbacks and a rebinding process. This would ensure that I would have a quality print product inside, and that everyone involved in the printing and publishing gets the credit they are due. From their, I had a foundation to create the beautiful collector's editions you see above!

Thank you to everyone who helped start us on this journey by supporting our first project, and to all who join our community by supporting us here!
