story:
Hi!

We are Zenith Writers, a writing organization created by teen librarians and writers Leah Parker and Kara Seal from Centennial, Colorado. We want to help aspiring young adult (YA) writers improve their skills by creating a writing center specifically geared towards their genre--the first of its kind in the Denver metro area. Our goal is to begin teaching courses by January 2013, but we need your help.

We need to raise $20,000 to cover the start-up costs of a location, classroom equipment, and instructors. So, we're turning to the supporters of teen books to ask for contributions. In exchange, we're offering free classes, webinars, or ten page critiques. Your contribution will help us to accomplish our dream of teaching YA focused writing classes, and further, it will support young adult writers of all ages who are unable to find courses intended solely for them.

Thanks! Leah & Kara

 

Zenith Writers is the brainchild of teen librarians Leah Parker and Kara Seal.

As advocates of the young adult genre (i.e. YA or teen) and crossover genre (i.e. adult books that appeal to teens and vice-versa, like “Hunger Games” or “Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children"), we live and breathe YA—including writing YA.

With the exception of an occasional author-taught class, young adult writing workshops are nearly impossible to find in Colorado or on the web.

Every year, tons of YA writers are overlooked, having to settle for childrens' or adult-based conferences in hopes of attending one of the few young adult sessions offered. This leaves many aspiring YA writers to rely on books, the Internet, or other means of self teaching.

We want to streamline that process and foster an environment where young adult writers are the priority and teach them the skills they need to seek publication.

 

To help aspiring YA writers learn the tools they need to successfully complete and seek publication for a novel. By providing creative writing workshops, classes, and webinars focused on young adult and crossover genres, we are supplying a demand that has been largely underserved until now.

 

We need your help in order to get Zenith Writers running by January 2013. Our goal of $20,000 will cover start-up costs, including:

-Basic business expenses including logo designer, lawyer, etc.

-Up to 24 chairs and 8 tables

-Trainer laptop and projector

-Adobe Connect software and recording equipment

-Securing a location and the first 1-3 months of rent

-Paying YA authors and publishing professionals to teach courses

 

We can't thank you enough for supporting us. Our genre-based perks include critiques, free classes or webinars. The perks are as follows:

We can't do this on our own, so spread the word to family, friends, and fellow writers. Forward this campaign link via Twitter, Facebook, Google+, etc. If you are a published or self-published author and would like to get involved, please contact us directly through our website.

Website: www.zenithwriters.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ZenithWriters

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ZenithWriters

story:
It's the final hours of Sarah's Indiegogo campaign for Jay so just a note from the home front. First of all, Jay will be donating in turn to help sick children because he knows how terrible the disease can be.

I know his friends would love to hear more from Jay, but he hasn't been able too be very talkative on his FB page or the various fund raising campaigns. I hope every one understands that he is having a pretty rough time right now. He has some 'okay' days, but mostly, he is sick and in pain constantly and usually can't get out of bed, even on his 'off chemo' days. Sometimes he can barely respond to direct messages, let alone post updates. I have posted a bit, but I'm careful, because believe it or not, Jay is a pretty private guy - he had a struggle with 'going public' but he wanted to 'get the word out' about colon cancer and that it attacks young people too.

Jay also feels a bit weird with everyone donating to his 'cause', but I know he really appreciates it because he has a long road back to health, before he can be back with all of you, going to work again and leading a normal life once more.

Everyone's thoughts and prayers and healing energies are wonderful, healing the spirit as well as the mind and of course, the body. Just a wonderful bunch of young people. Bless you. Jay will beat this. 

Now, back to Sarah's Indiegogo note (Thank you, Sweet Sares for all you've done and thank you to everyone who has helped with a donation or spreading the word or sending Jay words of love and encouragement). 
------------------------------------
We are a group of friends and family of Jay Hamilton, an amazing young musician who has been diagnosed with advanced metatastic colon cancer at only 34 years of age.

Jay is known to everyone as one of the kindest and most caring people we have ever known. He has always been there for his family and friends when they needed him.

Now, he needs us. We hope you will be able to help. Even a little from each person will go a long way.

We wish to help Jay purchase the natural health treatments needed to counteract the terrible effects of established treatments like chemotherapy. For example, one of the natural treatments recommended by his naturopathic doctor is intravenous Vitamin C which actually attacks the cancer cells and destroys them, but it will cost around $3,000 for a series of treatments. Herbal tinctures specifically for cancer patients cost $80 for a one week supply; other supplements recommended for chemo patients start at around $30-$60 per week each and up and there are six of them. None of this is covered by insurance. Organic foods are a must for Jay, and are also very expensive.

Jay has such a long road ahead of him with chemo, surgery and radiation therapy, so will be off work for 6 months to a year -- his income will be severely reduced. He's not sure how he can make it through financially.

We also hope to be able to help him have enough money to stay in his apartment where he lives with his wee cat, Misha and not have to be moved around due to lack of finances. We also want to help his family who travelled to Toronto to care for him. His younger brother has a young family himself and now finds himself without income while caring for Jay.

Please help us reach our goal and give Jay the best treatment available and help his family to be there and to care for him.

If you know Jay, you understand why we want to help this sweet and gentle soul, just as he has supported his family and many friends over the years.

And if you don't know Jay, we really hope that you will have the chance to meet him someday. Can you help us achieve that?

story:
Be among the first to get Mr. Gibraltar, the Ebook!

SEE MY SLIDESHOW LINK IN BLUE AT THE BOTTOM OF THE PAGE

Why:

A number of years ago I was in my final university class and the professor had all the students write a short story that they were passionate about.  My professor was an expert in publishing and editing and had himself written over 200 articles that had been published.  I wrote the story about what at the time was a very scary event that happened to me when I was a teenager.  Upon reviewing my paper, the professor commented to me that "this is good enough to be published."  He gave me a couple of options for submitting the paper to different magazines and shortly thereafter I graduated.  He instilled in me a great desire to write my first book.

Fast forward to today.  I have finally put together the pieces of the puzzle enough to now ask for your help in pre-selling my Ebook titled:  Mr. Gibraltar.

What:

Mr. Gibraltar is the story of one man's quest for love, truth, and an amazing connection to his past.  It chronicles Thomas Gibraltar's quest for truth as he tries to uncover who killed his father and why.  Along the way he meets and falls in love with a beautiful woman, something he had missed out on all his life.  And finally he is able to uncover a method of communicating with his deceased father who in turn tries to help him cope with life, love, and his new found method of communication.  Its a thrilling fiction novel that will keep you on the edge of your seat with tons of action, romance, and twists and turns.  Buy your copy of the ebook today!

Who:

The who is you!  I have a goal to pre-sell 15,000 copies of my Ebook.  The Ebook is only 5 dollars.  Many people I have talked to DON'T believe that I can pre-sell this many Ebooks.  I know that I can WITH YOUR HELP.  By doing simple math we can reach our goal by having everyone simply tell three friends about the book. Are you up to it?  Can you do it?  LETS MAKE IT HAPPEN!

When:

Time is of the essence.  This campaign ends shortly....So order today, and tell your friends about this exciting new Ebook.  Copies of the first two chapters will be sent out by Christmas Eve with the complete Ebook delivered by 2/28/13.   

Lets blow the doors off of the funding goal.  If we can pre-sell 20,000 copies of the E-book then EVERYONE WILL GET FREE FOOD. The free food offer is currently just set up for Utah.     

Facts to remember, things to do:

1.  Buy the E-book, a great value at only $5

2.  Help us meet our goal and get FREE FOOD!

3.  Please share this with at least two friends!

Thank you in advance for your help and excitement!  Great reading!

Sincerely,

Scott Rasmussen

43 year old father of three, one amazing wife, two dogs, two cats, two rabbits, a bird, and a gifted talent to write.

story:
WE’RE HALFWAY THERE!!!!!

With less than three days to go, we’re now at the halfway mark in raising the funds needed to publish “A Journey to Oneness!!” Hour by hour, with your generous contributions … and by sharing this campaign with others … you’re carrying us steadily closer to reaching the goal!!

Thank you with all my heart for believing in this work … and for adding the blessing of your support to help share these extraordinary Divine teachings with the world!! I know, hand in hand, we can make this book happen ... together. I know I can’t do it alone. When it comes down to it, that’s what Oneness is all about … isn’t it?

Love and Light,

Rasha                                                                                                             

ps: Please check “Updates” (see tab at the top of this page) for the details about all the Extra Bonus Perks that have just been added to this campaign!! These additional "Thank You" gifts are in addition to all the other perks posted here!!

 

 Help Rasha publish A Journey to Oneness !

The long-awaited sequel to the spiritual classic, Oneness, is ready to be launched, at last! Eight years in the works, loaded with Divine wisdom culled from over 3,000 pages of never-before-revealed guidance from Oneness—the Divinity we all share—A Journey to Oneness is poised and ready to be published! The editing, proofreading and typesetting of this 550 page classic-to-be are complete. Now, the finishing touches are underway!  Rasha is ready to share her own story with the world and take the precious teachings of Oneness to the next level. And she needs your support to be able to do it.                                                                                

The Teachings of Oneness: A Message that will Change your Life!

In case you’re new to the Divine wisdom of Oneness through Rasha, this video captures the essence of that profound message—and gives you a taste of the teachings that have changed the lives of thousands. For years, the book, Oneness, has been gifted with love from friend to friend, all over the world. Now, it’s time to take the Oneness teachings beyond those grassroots beginnings, and help them reach the awakening worldwide audience this life-changing spiritual wisdom was intended for. Your support, whether in the form of a financial contribution or simply by getting the word out through social media, is so appreciated!

 

              About the book, A Journey to Oneness

In A Journey to Oneness Rasha takes us along on a fascinating seven year odyssey through the labyrinths of consciousness. With the wisdom of Oneness as guide and Guru, this candid, revealing glimpse into the spiritual journey of a modern-day Messenger takes the reader the full distance from the abyss of radical material loss and the systematic dissolution of the linear identity, to the ecstatic heights of God Realization.

Rich with Divine insight and mind-stretching metaphysical concepts, this work traces the evolution of an emerging spiritual Master in a way that speaks directly to the inner quest of each of us. The loving guidance of Oneness, woven throughout the story, serves to awaken the sacred sense of Divine connectedness that waits within us all. The simple act of reading becomes a personal journey that the reader shares on an intimate experiential level.

An Overview of the Book:

A Journey to Oneness begins in 1998, by taking Rasha from the sweet success of a blossoming New Age jewelry business in the mountains of North Carolina, to a nightmare of shattered dreams and sudden financial ruin. In time, she’ll come to understand the significance of the radical loss of the material trappings of identity as a classic pre-cursor to spiritual awakening. But now, caught in the grasp of the volatile energies of transformation and the living theatre it creates, she watches in shocked disbelief as life as she knows it totally self-destructs. Suddenly homeless, she finds the safe harbor of a surreal, inherited condo in a village for the elderly in South Florida, where the transcription of the Divine Revelations in the landmark book, Oneness, begins.

Crisscrossing the landscape of America in a vintage van named “Vanessa”, this colorful journey goes on to take Rasha from the high-profile hoopla of the Whole Life Expo lecture circuit to the life of a spiritual recluse, tucked away in the remote mountains of the Northern New Mexico desert. There, lost in timeless moments of Divine ecstasy for days-on-end, she completes the transmissions for the book Oneness. The book is the culmination of a marathon four-year exercise in spiritual unfoldment, and no sooner is it finished, than the real journey begins.

An inner calling merges with the voice of destiny, and in a radical gesture of non-attachment, Grandpa’s Florida condo—and all tethering to a recognizable past—is cashed-in for a ticket to India. An odyssey unfolds and a spiritual quest springs to life with an unforgettable cast of exotic characters. Rasha takes us on a three year, virtual tour of spiritual India in what might be titled “The Murphy’s Law Guide to Awakening.” As Oneness deftly helps her circumnavigate the potholes along the road to “freedom,” and gives us a startling new vision of the nature of the changes now taking place within us all, the reader is given a crystal clear roadmap of the inner path to enlightenment.

A literary tapestry, colored by recurring bouts of disbelief, doubt, and a logical mind’s probing questions over what is actually happening as it unravels—woven seamlessly with the poetry and rapture of Divine Union—the story takes us for an authentic ride on the roller-coaster of spiritual transformation.

Three voices: the Divine Presence of Oneness, the voice of the full-spectrum, “linear identity” of Rasha, and the overview of the narrator, harmonize into a shared vision. The Journey culminates in the experience of Oneness as the Self. Along the way, there are vivid guest appearances, as unique channeled guidance, of some of the most significant spiritual luminaries of our times. As a seasoned channel, Rasha shares some of her personal, channeled conversations with Neem Karoli Baba, Osho, Anandamayi Ma, The Christ, and the Hindu monkey God, Hanuman.

Here, in five hundred pages of ground-breaking material, are the answers to the timeless questions that have challenged humankind to probe beyond the scientifically provable and unearth the realm of the experiential and the unquestionable. Here, in one woman’s unforgettable story is the key to the mysterious momentum of change suddenly unfolding within the depths of each of us, and within the world we share. Page by page, A Journey to Oneness takes us all hand-in-hand to common ground: the extraordinary experience of Oneness.  

                                                                        ~ ~ ~

What does it take to publish and promote a new book these days?

Printing and distributing books are the barest beginnings of what it takes to launch a new title in today's rapidly evolving world of publishing. Now the focus has shifted to a far broader scope: the added potential of a vibrant new world of e-books and audio books; Facebook and YouTube; websites and interactive blogs; teleseminars and social media. It's a technological publishing environment filled with promise and exciting new possibilities for reaching a worldwide audience with a life-changing message like the teachings of Oneness; an unprecedented opportunity for reaching more people, building links and creating community! At the same time, the new opportunities for spreading the word have created a need for technical support with the specialized know-how it now takes to bring a new book to life!

Until recently, it was still possible for a self-published author to coordinate all the aspects of publishing and promoting a book the old-fashioned way ... singlehanded. Working on a shoestring budget from South India, Rasha self-published the second edition of Oneness in 2003. And she's been handling all the details of printing, distributing and promoting the books, writing and designing the content for the Oneness website, www.onenesswebsite.com, and creating the two beautiful, free e-mail series by herself, ever since. (All this while continuing to transcribe the teachings of Oneness, of course.)

Now as Rasha prepares to launch A Journey to Oneness in today's totally transformed publishing environment, and reach out to a vast, rapidly expanding spiritual audience, she realizes that she can't do it alone anymore. To give the message of Oneness the outreach and momentum that's now possible, she’s going to need help. Naturally, she thought of you ... and hopes you'll be open to supporting the launch of this amazing new book!

We invite you to join Rasha by adding your own personal contribution to the energy of this effort, and help bring A Journey to Oneness to life!

 

Here’s what we need and what you’ll receive:

Our Estimate:

Printing: $25,000 (550 pages/10,000 copies)

Editing & Proofreading: $7,500

Publicist: $6,000

Cover Art: $4,000

Typesetting: $2,500

Print Production & Shipping: $2,000

Total funds needed: $47,000

 

Tokens of Gratitude for your Support!

NOTE: Lots of EXTRA BONUS PERKS have been added to this campaign, and are all  IN ADDITION TO the other perks listed here, to the right.

All BONUS PERKS are retroactive and are extended to everyone who has already made a contribution to this campaign!

 

Please choose from these expressions of appreciation for your generous support!

Priceless: Rasha’s boundless gratitude for spreading the word about this campaign to family and friends! Please share the link to this page with everyone you feel might resonate with it.

EXTRA BONUS PERK: Now, EVERYONE contributing to this campaign will receive a "Sneak Preview" chapter from the upcoming book, A Journey to Oneness!

$10 Donation:  A personal “thank you” e-mail from Rasha with one "Sneak Preview" chapter from A Journey to Oneness !

$25 Donation: An autographed copy of the original spiritual classic, "Oneness," written with your name and signed by Rasha.

$25 Donation:  Digital download of “The Meditations of Oneness” album by Rasha and Jim Oliver. Plus a personal “thank you” e-mail from Rasha with one "Sneak Preview" chapter from A Journey to Oneness !  

EXTRA BONUS PERK: Now, anyone contributing $35 to this campaign will receive an autographed copy of The Calling as a BONUS!

$35 Donation: A personally handwritten “Thank You” card of exquisite handmade paper, decorated with dried flowers, created in Auroville, India, and signed by Rasha. Plus two "Sneak Preview" chapters of A Journey to Oneness!

EXTRA BONUS PERK: Now, anyone contributing $50 to this campaign will receive an autographed copy of Oneness as a BONUS ... in addition to the other perks selected.

$50 Donation: A personal “thank you” e-mail from Rasha, with her reply to a question of your choice about your own spiritual journey or the teachings of Oneness.

$50 Donation: Oneness Audio Book digital download plus a personal “thank you” e-mail from Rasha.

EXTRA BONUS PERKS: Now, anyone contributing $100 -- or more -- to this campaign will receive autographed copies of BOTH Oneness AND The Calling, in addition to the other perks selected.

IN ADDITION: Anyone contributing $100 -- or more -- to this campaign will have their name listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of the upcoming book, A Journey to Oneness.

$100 Donation: A first edition, autographed, advance copy of A Journey to Oneness. (International, please add $10 for postage.) Shipped to you prior to the official release date.

$250 Donation: Your name, listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of the book,             A Journey to Oneness. Plus a personal "thank you" e-mail from Rasha

$350 Donation: Your name, listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of the book,             A Journey to Oneness. Plus an autographed advance copy of the book. Plus a personal "thank you" e-mail from Rasha.

$500 Donation: Your name, listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of A Journey to Oneness, plus three autographed advance copies of the book for gifting to friends! (International, please add $30 for postage.)

$1000 Donation: Your own personal half-hour Skype call with Rasha! Plus your name listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of A Journey to Oneness. Plus an autographed, advance copy of the book.

$2500 Donation: A meditation and discussion evening with Rasha for your own private gathering of students or friends. (USA only.) Rasha’s domestic airfare extra. Plus your name listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of A Journey to Oneness. Plus an autographed, advance copy of the book.

What if we exceed our fund-raising goal?

There are several exciting projects in the works which will be funded with the help of any additional revenue that comes through this fund-raising campaign. They include:

Completion of the brand new “Oneness Speaks” online blog page that’s now in the development stages. This new, interactive website will enable you to post comments and send your questions to Rasha, so she can share her insights and understandings with all of you simultaneously!

Production of a small, beautifully designed companion volume to the CD, The Meditations of Oneness, with the poetic text set in verse, in calligraphy, and illustrated with gorgeous nature photography. The volume has already been typeset. Funds are needed to produce and print it.

Recording, production and promotion of the beautiful, sequel audio album, "The Meditations of Oneness" Volume II.

                                                                        ~ ~ ~

                                        About Rasha
                         and the Teachings of Oneness

 

                                                

A modern-day Messenger, and author of the spiritual classic, Oneness, Rasha has worked as a courier of Divine guidance for over twenty years. In early 1998, she began a profound dialogue with the universal Presence, “Oneness”—the Divinity we all share. Word for word, she transcribed the principles that give us a new level of understanding of the mystery we call “life.” These teachings empower us to take a quantum leap into our own inner depths and totally transform our lives and our world. Oneness has sold over 100,000 copies in the US, by word-of-mouth alone, and has seven foreign language editions.

Rasha awakened to her inner-calling as a Divine Messenger in 1987. Her spiritual teachers emerged from within her and in the years that followed, she was taken step by step through the sacred journey to Oneness and through the life-altering changes that are shaking the foundation of today’s world. As a Messenger with a life-changing message, she has dedicated her life to addressing the global spiritual awakening that is the hallmark of these times. Rasha is not affiliated with any established spiritual path, religion or guru. Her teachings are universal and focus on the personal experience of the Divinity within each of us.

Now, the website, www.onenesswebsite.com has begun to bring those teachings to the eyes of the world. There, thousands of readers have signed-up for the beautiful, photographic “Wisdom of Oneness Messages” and the “A Moment of Oneness” audio e-mail series. Thousands more have watched and shared the beautiful flash movie, “Oneness: The Movie” which now has had nearly 120,000 views on YouTube.

An incurable world-traveler, Rasha divides her time between the remote mountains of Northern New Mexico and the mystical hills of South India. There, in blessed silence, life is filled with the joys of transcribing the words of Oneness for future volumes.

~ ~ ~

“Thank you SO much for adding the blessing of your energy and support to this fund-raiser to help me publish A Journey to Oneness ! Your generosity means the world to me.” --Rasha

Rasha takes us on a three year, virtual tour of spiritual India in what might be titled “The Murphy’s Law Guide to Awakening.” As Oneness deftly helps her circumnavigate the potholes along the road to “freedom,” and gives us a startling new vision of the nature of the changes now taking place within us all, the reader is given a crystal clear roadmap of the inner path to enlightenment.
A literary tapestry, colored by recurring bouts of disbelief, doubt, and a logical mind’s probing questions over what is actually happening as it unravels—woven seamlessly with the poetry and rapture of Divine Union—the story takes us for an authentic ride on the roller-coaster of spiritual transformation.
Three voices: the Divine Presence of Oneness, the voice of the full-spectrum, “linear identity” of Rasha, and the overview of the narrator, harmonize into a shared vision. The Journey culminates in the experience of Oneness as the Self. Along the way, there are vivid guest appearances, as unique channeled guidance, of some of the most significant spiritual luminaries of our times. As a seasoned channel, Rasha shares some of her personal, channeled conversations with Neem Karoli Baba, Osho, Anandamayi Ma, The Christ, and the Hindu monkey God, Hanuman.
Here, in five hundred pages of ground-breaking material, are the answers to the timeless questions that have challenged humankind to probe beyond the scientifically provable and unearth the realm of the experiential and the unquestionable. Here, in one woman’s unforgettable story is the key to the mysterious momentum of change suddenly unfolding within the depths of each of us, and within the world we share. Page by page, A Journey to Oneness takes us all hand-in-hand to common ground: the extraordinary experience of Oneness.  
                                                                        ~ ~ ~
What does it take to publish and promote a new book these days?
Printing and distributing books are the barest beginnings of what it takes to launch a new title in today's rapidly evolving world of publishing. Now the focus has shifted to a far broader scope: the added potential of a vibrant new world of e-books and audio books; Facebook and YouTube; websites and interactive blogs; teleseminars and social media. It's a technological publishing environment filled with promise and exciting new possibilities for reaching a worldwide audience with a life-changing message like the teachings of Oneness; an unprecedented opportunity for reaching more people, building links and creating community! At the same time, the new opportunities for spreading the word have created a need for technical support with the specialized know-how it now takes to bring a new book to life!
Until recently, it was still possible for a self-published author to coordinate all the aspects of publishing and promoting a book the old-fashioned way ... singlehanded. Working on a shoestring budget from South India, Rasha self-published the second edition of Oneness in 2003. And she's been handling all the details of printing, distributing and promoting the books, writing and designing the content for the Oneness website, www.onenesswebsite.com, and creating the two beautiful, free e-mail series by herself, ever since. (All this while continuing to transcribe the teachings of Oneness, of course.)
Now as Rasha prepares to launch A Journey to Oneness in today's totally transformed publishing environment, and reach out to a vast, rapidly expanding spiritual audience, she realizes that she can't do it alone anymore. To give the message of Oneness the outreach and momentum that's now possible, she’s going to need help. Naturally, she thought of you ... and hopes you'll be open to supporting the launch of this amazing new book!
We invite you to join Rasha by adding your own personal contribution to the energy of this effort, and help bring A Journey to Oneness to life!
 
Here’s what we need and what you’ll receive:
Our Estimate:
Printing: $25,000 (550 pages/10,000 copies)
Editing & Proofreading: $7,500
Publicist: $6,000
Cover Art: $4,000
Typesetting: $2,500
Print Production & Shipping: $2,000
Total funds needed: $47,000
 
Tokens of Gratitude for your Support!
NOTE: Lots of EXTRA BONUS PERKS have been added to this campaign, and are all  IN ADDITION TO the other perks listed here, to the right.
All BONUS PERKS are retroactive and are extended to everyone who has already made a contribution to this campaign!
 
Please choose from these expressions of appreciation for your generous support!
Priceless: Rasha’s boundless gratitude for spreading the word about this campaign to family and friends! Please share the link to this page with everyone you feel might resonate with it.
EXTRA BONUS PERK: Now, EVERYONE contributing to this campaign will receive a "Sneak Preview" chapter from the upcoming book, A Journey to Oneness!
$10 Donation:  A personal “thank you” e-mail from Rasha with one "Sneak Preview" chapter from A Journey to Oneness !
$25 Donation: An autographed copy of the original spiritual classic, "Oneness," written with your name and signed by Rasha.
$25 Donation:  Digital download of “The Meditations of Oneness” album by Rasha and Jim Oliver. Plus a personal “thank you” e-mail from Rasha with one "Sneak Preview" chapter from A Journey to Oneness !  
EXTRA BONUS PERK: Now, anyone contributing $35 to this campaign will receive an autographed copy of The Calling as a BONUS!
$35 Donation: A personally handwritten “Thank You” card of exquisite handmade paper, decorated with dried flowers, created in Auroville, India, and signed by Rasha. Plus two "Sneak Preview" chapters of A Journey to Oneness!
EXTRA BONUS PERK: Now, anyone contributing $50 to this campaign will receive an autographed copy of Oneness as a BONUS ... in addition to the other perks selected.
$50 Donation: A personal “thank you” e-mail from Rasha, with her reply to a question of your choice about your own spiritual journey or the teachings of Oneness. 
$50 Donation: Oneness Audio Book digital download plus a personal “thank you” e-mail from Rasha.
EXTRA BONUS PERKS: Now, anyone contributing $100 -- or more -- to this campaign will receive autographed copies of BOTH Oneness AND The Calling, in addition to the other perks selected.
IN ADDITION: Anyone contributing $100 -- or more -- to this campaign will have their name listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of the upcoming book, A Journey to Oneness.
$100 Donation: A first edition, autographed, advance copy of A Journey to Oneness. (International, please add $10 for postage.) Shipped to you prior to the official release date.
$250 Donation: Your name, listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of the book,             A Journey to Oneness. Plus a personal "thank you" e-mail from Rasha
$350 Donation: Your name, listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of the book,             A Journey to Oneness. Plus an autographed advance copy of the book. Plus a personal "thank you" e-mail from Rasha.
$500 Donation: Your name, listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of A Journey to Oneness, plus three autographed advance copies of the book for gifting to friends! (International, please add $30 for postage.)
$1000 Donation: Your own personal half-hour Skype call with Rasha! Plus your name listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of A Journey to Oneness. Plus an autographed, advance copy of the book.
$2500 Donation: A meditation and discussion evening with Rasha for your own private gathering of students or friends. (USA only.) Rasha’s domestic airfare extra. Plus your name listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments page of A Journey to Oneness. Plus an autographed, advance copy of the book.
What if we exceed our fund-raising goal?
There are several exciting projects in the works which will be funded with the help of any additional revenue that comes through this fund-raising campaign. They include:
Completion of the brand new “Oneness Speaks” online blog page that’s now in the development stages. This new, interactive website will enable you to post comments and send your questions to Rasha, so she can share her insights and understandings with all of you simultaneously!
Production of a small, beautifully designed companion volume to the CD, The Meditations of Oneness, with the poetic text set in verse, in calligraphy, and illustrated with gorgeous nature photography. The volume has already been typeset. Funds are needed to produce and print it.
Recording, production and promotion of the beautiful, sequel audio album, "The Meditations of Oneness" Volume II.
                                                                        ~ ~ ~
                                        About Rasha                         and the Teachings of Oneness

 
                                                 
A modern-day Messenger, and author of the spiritual classic, Oneness, Rasha has worked as a courier of Divine guidance for over twenty years. In early 1998, she began a profound dialogue with the universal Presence, “Oneness”—the Divinity we all share. Word for word, she transcribed the principles that give us a new level of understanding of the mystery we call “life.” These teachings empower us to take a quantum leap into our own inner depths and totally transform our lives and our world. Oneness has sold over 100,000 copies in the US, by word-of-mouth alone, and has seven foreign language editions.
Rasha awakened to her inner-calling as a Divine Messenger in 1987. Her spiritual teachers emerged from within her and in the years that followed, she was taken step by step through the sacred journey to Oneness and through the life-altering changes that are shaking the foundation of today’s world. As a Messenger with a life-changing message, she has dedicated her life to addressing the global spiritual awakening that is the hallmark of these times. Rasha is not affiliated with any established spiritual path, religion or guru. Her teachings are universal and focus on the personal experience of the Divinity within each of us.
Now, the website, www.onenesswebsite.com has begun to bring those teachings to the eyes of the world. There, thousands of readers have signed-up for the beautiful, photographic “Wisdom of Oneness Messages” and the “A Moment of Oneness” audio e-mail series. Thousands more have watched and shared the beautiful flash movie, “Oneness: The Movie” which now has had nearly 120,000 views on YouTube.
An incurable world-traveler, Rasha divides her time between the remote mountains of Northern New Mexico and the mystical hills of South India. There, in blessed silence, life is filled with the joys of transcribing the words of Oneness for future volumes.
~ ~ ~
“Thank you SO much for adding the blessing of your energy and support to this fund-raiser to help me publish A Journey to Oneness ! Your generosity means the world to me.” --Rasha

story:
Short Summary

You know Chinua Achebe and Wole Soyinka—now meet Africa’s next powerful literary voices. Gambit: Newer African Writing is a collection of nine interviews and original short stories by writers from across Africa. This is the first book of its kind.

There are a few anthologies of African literature, but none of them focus on young writers, and none of them feature interviews plus short stories. Gambit is wholly unique!!

The stories in Gambit reflect the nuances that arise from living in a post-postcolonial Africa, where stereotypes are crumbling and writers are willing to tackle themes that are more social than political. Furthermore, unlike other anthologies, Gambit's writers are mostly based in their home countries, putting them closer to the social themes they lyrically confront.

Why include the interviews? Because we want to inform and inspire. Stories are not written in a vacuum: they are drafted out of experience by real people living complicated lives. We hope that the interviews in this volume not only shed light on the experiences and inspirations of the authors, but also encourage young writers to take up the pen and share their stories.

Reading literature from around the world helps to bridge cultural divides and increase understanding and appreciation of other cultures and experiences. In a world that is increasingly interconnected, it is crucial that we build respect and awareness of the lives and lands with which we are ever-more connected. Gambit is one project toward this effort.

Gambit will be published (paperback) by The Mantle, an online forum that publishes emerging, critical voices from around the world. Gambit is edited by Mantle contributor and novelist Emmanuel Iduma (from Nigeria) and The Mantle’s editor-in-chief Shaun Randol (based in New York City). We will use the printing services of McNally Jackson bookstore in New York.

We have the interviews. We have the short stories. All we need is your help to make Gambit a reality.

Participating writers:

  1. Novuyo Rosa Tshuma (Zimbabwe)
  2. Abubakar Adam Ibrahim (Nigeria)
  3. Donald Molosi (Botswana)
  4. Suzanne Ushie (Nigeria)
  5. Dango Mkandawire (Malawi)
  6. Ayobami Adebayo (Nigeria)
  7. Richard Ali (Nigeria)
  8. Abdul Adan (Somalia)
  9. Dami Ajayi (Nigeria)


What We Need & What You Get

We're aiming to raise $4300, which covers:

  • $900 to pay the writers ($100 x 9 writers)
  • $250 for cover art
  • $1100 for an initial print run, including $350 for set up
  • $250 for perks (see side panel)
  • $800 for copy editing and proofreading
  • $500 for editorial costs
  • $250 for misc., including marketing

If we do not meet our fundraising goal, we will attempt to pay our writers and contributors first, then proceed with a limited initial print run. Note: the items above add up to $4000. The extra $300 (in our goal of $4300) helps to pay for Indiegogo's hosting fees.)


We're offering fantastic perks! Take a look at the side for unique gifts at various donation levels.


The Impact

There is no other book like Gambit in bookstores!!  

  • We are introducing an award-winning cadre of emerging writers to wider audiences.
  • Some of Gambit's writers are being published in an anthology for the first time. We are excited to provide an opening for new and important writers!
  • Gambit's interviews are an essential resource for other young writers. The conversations will help shape the sensibilities of other emerging writers.


Publicity

  • Gambit author Dango Mkandawire is featured in the Nyasa Times (Malawi) discussing his participation in the anthology and what it means to emerging African writers.
  • Emmanuel Iduma was interviewed by Africa In Words about Gambit, his writing, and related subjects.
  • Abubakar Adam Ibrahim, Gambit contributor, short-listed for the 2013 Caine Prize!
  • World Literature Today magazine featured Gambit in their weekly roundup.
  • Shaun Randol spoke about Gambit on Truthdig Radio. Conversation begins at 46:50. 
  • Emmanuel Iduma wrote about Gambit as the "sound of things to come" in his short essay on "the next frontier for African literature" for Think Africa Press. 
  • South Africa's popular Books Live, a resource for southern African writers and publishers, showed our fundraiser some "link love." 

Other Ways You Can Help!

  • Please spread the word! Share on Facebook, Twitter (#Gambit), Tumblr, etc.
  • Can you host a reading or party? Please tell us!
  • Can you sell the book in your establishment? Reach out!
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
A Leap Of Faith

On this day, September 11th, 2014, it is with great humility, very clear Divine Guidance, and mustering a lot of courage from the encouragement of some wonderful supporters that this leap of faith is being taken.

My name is Antonio Aversano. On September 11th, 2001, my dear Dad Lou was killed during the attacks on the World Trade Center. That day reshaped the lives of many people around the world. For me, with the (now clearly Divinely guided) transformational ways that Me and my Dad healed and grew our relationship in the two years prior to his death, the day of his passing became a Soul and Spiritual Catalyst tied to a web of Life Lessons that continue to ripple forth to this Day.

From the encouragement of some special people in my life, and a Divine calling that has been beckoning since 2002, "From Ashes To Light" is an attempt to: 1) Share many of the Life Transforming stories and perspectives that have risen through me from the ashes of 9/11/01;  2) Offer insights and new perspectives for people (including some of my own family) who might be struggling with loss or are simply stuck in the "fear of our time" in hopes the Love that flows along with these words and insights might shed some Light through the darkness and offer a bigger picture of what is  possible for human beings and our lives together here on planet Earth; and 3) By taking this leap of faith I am opening to a new level of healing and wholeness in my life by sharing my deepest truths around the loss of my Dad and the unique ways Life seems to have offered Spiritual Lessons through this tragedy that are wanting to be shared with the world. Sharing such perspectives that might serve others in some way, ease the suffering, and make the world a better place is the Highest Calling of my Soul.

Making This A Reality

  • I have never published a book before so, again, this is a leap of faith as far as how long reaching completion is going to take or how much in resources it might require to make this a reality. And, I have already researched the self-publishing options at Balboa Press, so I am hoping that (if I can raise even close to my funding goal), that will cover the basics.
  • Basically, however much I raise will determine how big of a publishing package I am able to choose and how much time (outside of my other projects that pay the bills) I can devote to putting this together - sooner or later. (^_^) 
  • I envisioned what I hope will be some unique offerings including some personal options to allow me to Soul Serve you with some of the Soul Inspiring gifts that I was put on this Earth to share with others.

Supporting A Larger Vision

I believe we are at a unique time on planet Earth. It feels to me we are ending an era of living in illusions based in fear, survival, and of feeling like (and living like) "isolated bags of skin, dragging around a dreary ego". I believe we are on the verge of a new era of all people recognizing, honoring, and celebrating the immense beauty, gifts, and possibilities of our existence. I believe we are moving towards the vision of what I call "A Possible Planet" that is nothing less than the very best visions that all Human Beings hold in their Hearts - a world where all basic needs are met and where all people are living joyfully free, at peace, and in harmony with each other and all of Life on planet Earth.

It is this vision that you are supporting by supporting this book as the words and messages that lie within the pages are speaking to that very possibility and represent some of the small steps that I was offered - in an unlikely way through the tragedy of 9/11 and the loss of my Dad - to move towards that vision in my own Life.

This vision is the guiding star of my life and is at the foundation of all the ways I have successfully and will continue to serve others and the Awakening of our world.

    Overcoming Obstacles

    It seems that all roads are pointing towards, NOW! I have been so blessed over the last 10 years of my life to have been guided by amazing teachers, mentors, friends, family, supporters, and many empowering experiences. When I look back, I see how it all fits together in this moment - from the many Spiritual Journey's, to the numerous Professional Trainings, to the recent experiences of being inspired by a Divine Writing Mentor, aligning with an Angel of a book editor, having multiple communities of creative support, and being blessed by a Business Coach with endless compassion and wisdom. I feel there is nothing in the way of the success of this project. All I have to do is show up and it is going to happen. And, starting this campaign IS the catalyst of saying YES to the blessings of bringing this to Life. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you are not able to support with a donation, that doesn't mean you can't help:

    • If you are inspired in any way by what I've shared so far, it would be a great support for this project to get the word out and share with your friends about this campaign.
    • There are plenty of Indiegogo share tools to use here. Go for it!

story:
Hello All,

Thank you so much for taking the time to visit my campaign page! For those of you who don't know me, my name is Virginia A. Davis; I am a Head Start Teacher, a poet, creative writer, advocate for Literacy, and an aspiring novelist. Since I was a teenage girl, I have been strongly captivated by the art of transcribing my imaginary ideas, fictitious characters, and real-life experiences to paper. As a young girl and as an adult, I have spent many nights pouring out the depths of my soul onto the lined pages of my notebook, while simultaneously staining the paper with tears of despair and hope. I am forever grateful that I fell in love with writing and words, for they have both served as perpetual driving forces in my life.

I have always had an insistent desire to make a positive impact on the lives of others through the words of my creative literature. A few months ago, the plot of this children’s novel dropped on my heart almost out of nowhere. Before this story was complete, I knew that it was going to positively affect the lives of many young boys and girls who may be suffering from low self-esteem, self-doubt, or hopelessness. As an avid writer, I have composed a variety of short stories, poems, and potential books; out of the enormous creative content that I have amassed, I am certain that this story will serve as an immeasurable uplift and inspiration to our younger generation.

Unfortunately, in today’s society we have cultivated a stern belief of what is beautiful and what is not. We have adopted an unfair reasoning of what and who is acceptable, and who and what is not. There are a multitude of young women, men, boys, and girls who are affected by the narrow-mindedness of our beliefs, and view themselves as inadequate or inferior. Growing up, I, too had these derogatory, painful thoughts about myself, and was often hurt by the words and actions of others toward me.

 I wrote this inspiring story based off of my own real-life experience of dealing with low self-esteem as a young girl and as an adult. The road has been tough, but I learned to accept and glorify myself, even if others do not accept or value all of my attributes. It is my belief, that the content of this book will teach another how young child how to overcome the same obstacles. 

 I strongly believe that this book will immensely impact many of our troubled youth who feel that there is no one who cares for them and can relate to their pain. I deeply yearn to reach out to that hurt child who feels rejected by their peers, family members, associates, and society as a whole. I truly feel compelled to touch the heart of the pained child who thinks that they are inadequate and does not believe in himself. I hope to let a trouble youth know that they are far from inadequate, and that anything is possible for them if they love and believe in themselves. By reading this book, many of our youth will cultivate a stronger and higher value of themselves, and will attain a confidence that will be invaluable to them throughout the course of their lifetimes.  

With the help of a few caring individuals, we can change the lives of many children and young adults. We can offer a book of hope to an individual who may bask in hopelessness, and empower someone who feels powerless. This is more than a children’s book on the horizon; it is a touching story and movement that will evoke positive change in the lives of many.

story_txt:
Hello All,
Thank you so
much for taking the time to visit my campaign page! For those of you who don't
know me, my name is Virginia A. Davis; I am a Head Start Teacher, a poet, creative writer, advocate for Literacy, and an aspiring novelist. Since I was a
teenage girl, I have been strongly captivated by the art of transcribing my
imaginary ideas, fictitious characters, and real-life experiences to paper. As
a young girl and as an adult, I have spent many nights pouring out the depths
of my soul onto the lined pages of my notebook, while simultaneously staining
the paper with tears of despair and hope. I am forever grateful that I fell in
love with writing and words, for they have both served as perpetual driving
forces in my life. 
I have always
had an insistent desire to make a positive impact on the lives of others through
the words of my creative literature. A few months ago, the plot of this children’s novel dropped on my heart almost out of nowhere. Before this story was
complete, I knew that it was going to positively affect the lives of many young
boys and girls who may be suffering from low self-esteem, self-doubt, or
hopelessness. As an avid writer, I have composed a variety of short stories,
poems, and potential books; out of the enormous creative content that I have
amassed, I am certain that this story will serve as an immeasurable uplift
and inspiration to our younger generation.
Unfortunately,
in today’s society we have cultivated a stern belief of what is beautiful and
what is not. We have adopted an unfair reasoning of what and who is acceptable,
and who and what is not. There are a multitude of young women, men, boys, and
girls who are affected by the narrow-mindedness of our beliefs, and view
themselves as inadequate or inferior. Growing up, I, too had these derogatory,
painful thoughts about myself, and was often hurt by the words and actions of
others toward me.
 I wrote this inspiring story based
off of my own real-life experience of dealing with low self-esteem as a young
girl and as an adult. The road has been tough, but I learned to accept and
glorify myself, even if others do not accept or value all of my attributes. It is my belief, that the content of this book will teach another how young child how to overcome the same obstacles.  I strongly believe that
this book will immensely impact many of our troubled youth who feel that
there is no one who cares for them and can relate to their pain. I deeply yearn
to reach out to that hurt child who feels rejected by their peers, family
members, associates, and society as a whole. I truly feel compelled to touch
the heart of the pained child who thinks that they are inadequate and does not
believe in himself. I hope to let a trouble youth know that they are far from inadequate, and that anything is possible for them if they love and believe in themselves. By reading this book, many of our youth
will cultivate a stronger and higher value of themselves, and will attain a confidence
that will be invaluable to them throughout the course of their lifetimes.  
With the help of
a few caring individuals, we can change the lives of many children and young adults.
We can offer a book of hope to an individual who may bask in hopelessness, and empower
someone who feels powerless. This is more than a children’s book on the
horizon; it is a touching story and movement that will evoke positive change
in the lives of many.
Thank you so
much for your time, and I hope that you are inspired to contribute to my cause.

the campaign. Please, forward the campaign website to a friend, family member,
or anyone who you think would be willing to contribute. Thank you all so very
much in advance!
Blessings!

story:
The Radical Independence Campaign has made a huge contribution to the Independence movement. We believe our meetings, conferences, local group activities and our dynamic approach to campaigning and developing a new grassroots movement of the radical left can really make a difference in helping to win the referendum. Last year we brought together over 1000 activists and outlined our vision for a new Scotland. Now we are working flat out to get that message to the communities that need it most.


Everything that we have done has been run on a shoe string budget. We have no full-time staff, but we do have dedicated activists all over the country. We have never let our lack of funds dampen our ambitions – and now we are asking you for one last cash injection before the big day itself. From building a network of pro-independence school students, to running community events and canvassing we want to everything we can to inspire and empower.

So, if you’ve been to our events, and seen us on the streets, if you believe that a movement for social justice needs to be at the heart of the independence movement, and progressive left wing ideals at the heart of the debate then we’d really appreciate your financial support. With your help we can transform Scotland.

We need one last financial contribution from you to reach a £3000 target. This will:

  • Allow us to get materials into as many target areas as possible
  • Help us set up new groups
  • Undertake a mass campaign including tours, meetings, demonstrations etc
  • Having no full-time staff, not worrying about money means we can focus our energy on winning as many Yes votes as possible and dedicate time to developing the campaign.
  • We will have a number of surprise events, many being developed locally, which need your funding to make the impact they need to

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that you may not be able to donate financially, but we value any input you can provide. E-Mail radicalindependence@gmail.com for more information or check the following links for activities in your area and information on how you can set up your own group, affiliate and shape the campaign.

ANOTHER SCOTLAND IS COMING: BE PART OF IT

story:
I wrote to heal and I ended up writing a book. I kept going: 

Sharing her story of what happens first-hand when she voluntarily seeks treatment at a mental health facility in the State of California, Lisa Marie Quillinan exposes the sad misfortune of being treated unfairly and the deterioration it takes on physically. Seemingly gutted and stripped completely of everything she knew and everything she was, Quillinan rebuilds among the loss, the trauma and the diagnosis, while she fights for hope and courage to find her faith again....all the while, writing this book. 

In “Little Did I Know,” Quillinan discovers the raw reality of an unfortunately flawed system in our country. The mental health system has been far neglected. With random acts of senseless violence on the rise, merging with the rapid progress of technology and communication, it is becoming more evident that we are failing in effectively treating one of the most important and evolving areas of our body: our brain.

After what appears to be pure and utter abandonment from all avenues of life, after what appears to be a major "rock bottom," LMQ uncovers the tragic truth that there exists an alarming stigma with mental illness, still. Throughout this narrative we follow LMQ as she rebuilds a new foundation of self-worth, self-reliance, new friends and prayer, among the backdrop of a thorough explanation and investigation of the Joint Commission and the pharmaceutical industry pre- and post-1942.

About the author:

Lisa Marie Quillinan is a professional Voice Artist living in Sherman Oaks, CA with her dog, Benny & the Jetts. Three years ago, she was diagnosed with BiPolar Disorder. In an attempt to heal from her experience she had in the health care system, Quillinan writes about it. For more info on her, please visit: www.lisamariequillinan.com 

How you can help:

I need your help to get my story out. My intention for this project is to fight to eliminate the stigma that exists with mental illness and to educate people. By contributing to my campaign, you will help me with this project in many ways, for instance, you will be a part of helping me:

  • Finish this book
  • Independently publish this book
  • Find environmentally, sustainable ways to print copies
  • Produce an audio book and provide multiple translations
  • Create a multi-media book that incorporates a soundtrack, photographs, voiceover and video
  • Inspire someone with my words and encourage someone to keep going because this isn't easy

*If you cannot contribute dollars at this time, you can still help:

Please share this campaign with someone. Please spread the word. Please educate yourself on mental illness; It may save some lives.

  • CLICK HERE TO READ AN EXCERPT 

The video featured above was created over a year ago while I was writing this book. I shot over 120 minutes of footage on my iPhone. I had lost who I was so I uncovered various pieces of art that I created and I shot it. The video took on a life of its own and I allowed for it to unfold. It became a love letter to myself and a delicate reminder of who I, in fact, was and still am. I'd like to think of it as a nurturing overture to this manuscript.

Throughout my journey, I uncovered new outlets to release some grief and face my fears. Stand-up comedy helped a lot. Here's a set I did at the 2012 LAFF in Austin, TX.

2012 LAFF Ladies Are Funny Fest - Austin TX*

*Contains strong language; discusses sex; touches on drugs. Not suitable for anyone under 18 years of age?

story:
Cuando creamos Máximo Avance hace siete años, pensamos en tener un espacio para la difusión del football en México con una plataforma multimedia, con videos, transmisiones y todo lo que internet ofrece hoy en día.

A lo largo de este tiempo hemos sido testigos de grandes historias de nuestro football, pero la ausencia mediática en eventos internacionales es algo que nos obliga a buscar oportunidades para traer a nuestro País historias de éxito como lo han hecho las chicas del Flag o la Selección Universitaria de Uppsala.

El apoyo de patrocinadores ha sido complicado y es por ello que buscamos el apoyo de la gente que cree en nuestros proyectos e ideales para ayudar a tener un mejor football en México.

Es un proyecto cinematográfico para mostrar la historia del fútbol americano en México, contar la experiencia de 45 jugadores que van con un sueño y en el que la calidad del material debe estar a su altura.

Máximo Avance tendrá una cobertura presencial con transmisiones en vivo, entrevistas sobre lo que sucede en Kuwait y el documental, pero necesitamos tu apoyo.

Necesitamos llevar nuestro deporte al lugar que merece y en estos meses donde el fútbol absorbe los presupuestos en marketing ha sido complicado que alguna marca compre nuestra idea.

Este documental será determinante para mostrar que estamos dispuestos a hacer cosas grandes, en el campo de juego y en la forma que debe ser cubierto informativamente nuestro deporte.

Ustedes, los aficionados y gente que aman este deporte pueden ayudar mucho en la integración con esta clase de proyectos que buscan darle espacio a nuestro fútbol americano.

El costo que representa viajar a Kuwait y la producción de los contenidos es elevada, es por ello que Máximo Avance necesita colaboradores para hacer realidad esto.

Máximo Avance ha destinado presupuesto para avanzar en estas semanas donde los jugadores han entrenado, a un mes de partir aún no contamos con los recursos para lograr esta aventura.

Afortunadamente el staff de Sack TV quienes se dedican a hacer cine, estarán apoyando esto buscando un producto de calidad.

La mayor parte del presupuesto se va a la logística del viaje, personal de producción y beneficios para los donantes, sin dejar atrás la necesidad de editar y post-producir más de 500 horas de grabación y buscar bandas de música que puedan aportar material ya que no se tiene presupuesto para comprar derechos de música.

Tus aportaciones ayudan este proyecto y podrás tener productos de colección de nuestro documental de edición limitada, así como productos firmados.

Además la oportunidad de ver el documental antes que el público y la posibilidad de tener física y digitalmente el contenido para conservarlo.

La calidad y tiempos de nuestro proyecto va relacionado con superar la meta, si logramos hacerlo tendremos el complemento para hacerlo realidad, de lo contrario ayudará para solventar costos y no podremos realizarlo como amerita la magnitud del evento.

Tengan por seguro que Máximo Avance hará una cobertura muy completa, con todo lo que ustedes deben saber de los protagonistas y la interacción en vivo durante los programas que haremos.

Hablaremos del ambiente, del juego, de los aciertos y errores para que ustedes estén informados sobre lo que pasa en este Mundial.

Viene una nueva etapa de vivir nuestro fútbol americano, ustedes son pilares de esto. Si no tienes la capacidad de aportar, ayuda difundiendo este mensaje, esta campaña para recaudar fondos y ser testigos de la aventura de 45 chavos que van con el anhelo de un Campeonato Mundial.


Estamos trabajando en algunas ideas para la realización del cartel del documental, así como los productos que regalaremos a la gente que haga aportaciones como playeras, gorras y sudaderas, si quisieras participar con algún diseño y ser parte de este proyecto envía tus propuestas a acarlos@maximoavance.com

story:
Hello!

My name is Ash Harrison and I am a 24 year old, African-American lesbian living in Glendale, California. I have always wanted to write books for children and as of last month, I and a close friend of mine decided to create a series of books celebrating the diversity of LGBT families and friends. 

"My 2 Mommies" will be the first book in the series. The book is about a little girl sharing her every day activities with her two lesbian mothers.

Did you miss your chance to back the campaign? Go to AuthorMedia.com/Crowdfunding to buy this directly.

In The Ultimate Crowdfunding Course for Authors, author Mary DeMuth and crowdfunding coach Thomas Umstattd walk you through what it takes to run a successful crowdfunding campaign. 

The Rewards:

The rewards on the right hand side of this page contain the following "perks".

 

THE "MAGIC" SPREADSHEET 

The Ultimate Crowdfunding Planning Tool ($29 Value)

 

 

Get exclusive access to “the spreadsheet” that enabled Author Media and Mary DeMuth to achieve their crowdfunding goals. 

 

 This tool comes with:

 

  • Crowd Calculator - Predict how many backers you are likely to get based on how many people follow you via social media and email.
  • Budget - Calculate the cost of producing your book. Also includes an optional section to budget for stretch goal cost so you don't get surprised by new expenses.
  • Campaign Planner - Predict how much money you are likely to bring in based on the number of backers and the price and popularity of your rewards.
  • Progress Tracker - Track your campaign’s progress to see if you are on track toward your goal.

 

 


This tool also comes with a video tutorial to help you use it. You don't need to be a spreadsheet ninja (or even own Microsoft Excel) to plan your campaign.

THE COMPLETE COURSE

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Ultimate Crowdfunding Course for Authors ($149 Value)

Here is a quick video overview of what comes in the course:

 

 

 

This crowdfunding course comes with 8 valuable sessions. Each session includes:

 

  • Audio MP3
  • eBook PDF (Based on the Transcript)
  • Worksheet (not pictured)

Session #1: How to Build a Tribe - 7 Crowd Building Steps Authors Must Take Before They Launch a Crowdfunding Campaign ($19.95 Value)

 

 

Most crowdfunding projects fail because the author lacks an engaged crowd. Secret: the larger the tribe, the more money you can raise. 

 You'll discover:

  • A simple 7-step process for building a tribe.
  • Strategic ways to grow your email list.
  • How to communicate with your tribe via Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest and other social networks.

Session #2: 4 Campaign Creation Secrets of Successful Crowdfunding Authors ($19.95 Value) 

 

 

 

 

 

In this session we walk you through a crowdfunding  page, explaining each facet. 

You'll discover:

  • How to craft a compelling Kickstarter/Indiegogo page.
  • Why creating an effective blurb helps sell your project.
  • How to find a great book cover image, even if you're not an artist.

Session #3: Sweet Rewards - Proven Strategies for Realistic Funding Goals and Enticing Rewards ($19.95) 

 

 

 

 

 

The key to meeting your crowdfunding goal is creating compelling and easy-to-fulfill backing levels. 

You'll discover:

  • How to set a realistic funding goal.
  • How to create irresistible backing levels.
  • Why brainstorming stretch goals now will help you shoot beyond your goal.

Session #4: Producing a WOW Video - How to Create A Captivating Video on Any Budget ($9.95 Value) 

 

 

 

 

 

The video is the very first thing your potential backer will see, so it's important to get it right. 

You'll discover:

  • How to leverage the power of story to woo an audience.
  • What to say and what to leave out of your short video.
  • How to produce the video on a budget, along with video tips.

Session #5: Kickstarter Vs. IndieGogo - How to Determine Which Crowdfunding Platform is Best for Your Book ($9.95 Value) 

 

 

 

 

 

Learn the advantages and disadvantages of Kickstarter, IndieGogo and other popular crowdfunding platforms. 

 You'll discover:

  • The primary similarities and differences between Kickstarter and Indiegogo.
  • Why one platform may fit your particular project more than another.
  • The inner workings of all crowdfunding platforms so you can make an informed decision about which one to choose.

Session #6: Getting to 100% - Promotion Principles of Successfully-Funded Books ($19.95 Value) 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Never underestimate the power of communicating often with your backers and future backers as you make your way to 100% funding. 

 You'll discover:

  • The promotion secrets of bestselling authors.
  • How to turn backers into project evangelists.
  • How to leverage social media channels even if you're timid about promotion.

Session #7: Beyond 100% - Stretch Goal Strategies of Highly Successful Campaigns ($19.95 Value) 

 

 

 

 

 

Stretch goals are bonuses you give your backers after you pass your initial funding goal, giving incentive boost funding beyond 100%. 

 You'll discover:

  • Stretch goal ideas that any author can utilize.
  • How to avoid bankrupting yourself with pricey stretch goals.
  • How to get maximum momentum by setting goals that are not too close and not too far.

Session #8: Delivering Happiness - 5 Keys to Stress-Free Fulfillment ($19.95 Value) 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Delivering what you promised does not have to be stressful or even require arduous work. 

 You'll discover:

  • How to automate the delivery process and save yourself unnecessary work.
  • An easy way to deliver digital goods like eBooks and MP3s.
  • How to motivate your new tribe to help you launch your book.

Indiegogo Exclusive Bonus Pack ($697.99 Value)

 

 

The following bonuses are only available to folks who back this project through Indiegogo. 

 

MyBookTable Developer ($99 Value)

 

 

MyBookTable is a WordPress Plugin to help authors sell more books and make affiliate money through sites like Amazon and Barnes & Noble. 

Find out more about MyBookTable.

 1 Year Lifetime Bestseller Society Membership ($499 Value) 

 

 The Bestseller Society is an exclusive members-only learning community that will help you realize your publishing dreams—both in writing your book and in promoting like a bestseller. Instead of searching everywhere for elusive information, we find the best in the industry for you. Learn more about the Bestseller Society. 

11 Secrets of Getting Published eBook ($9.99 Value) 

 

 

 

 

 

See how easily you can learn the secrets of getting published! Frustrated by how much there is to learn to finally see your name in print with a big publishing house? Mired in confusion about your next steps?

story:
Short Summary

  • I am a working mom and Navy veteran with a strong desire to make a change... both in my life and anyone else's life who wants something better to read! 
  • We Are... Magazine will not have a target market as it will be for everyone.  It doesn't have direct competition because it changes every month.  The word(s) that follow We Are... will set the theme for that month's issue.  We Are... Forgetful will focus on stages of Alzheimer's and how families cope with it.  We Are... Addicted will focus on the trials and outcomes of lives affected by drugs, alcohol and even children with technology addictions.  We Are... Beautiful  will discover natural beauty inside and out. Please visit my website, www.weare-magazine.com for more information!
  • I read and hear the stories of how the rich and famous deal with medical problems, addictions, theft and whatnot... the only problem is the rest of us can not afford to approach life in the same manner.  While their story may be heartwarming, it is not actually helpful.  I want to change that.  I want to give real people real stories.  I want people to be able to read my magazine and say, "Wow, I'm not the only one!" or "I never thought of that", etc.  I want to explore the hows and whys of life, and to share with everybody out there that we are not so different after all.
  • If I can reach my goal it will really be a dream come true.  I have already built my website, obtained my DBA, I have an accounting program and  have started writing my stories.  I have 2 regional  photographers willing to trade their services for full credit in the magazine, and I have people scheduled for interview on stories for 3 future issues.


What We Need & What You Get

  • I have set a goal of $4500.  $1200 of it is for the software for the actual magazine, and it is a lifetime license. I really want this particular program because it allows me to offer actual print copies and makes the subscription process a dream. My motto is "A magazine reaching out to everyone, everywhere, every month" and I would not be living up to that if I only offer digital. Approx $1000 for additional software and printing applications. $1000 will be for the remainder of the legal steps needed... copyright, registration, contracts and such. The remaining money will go towards fees, supplies and advertising.The funding I am asking for gets me the actual last things I need, nothing more.  Anything over my goal will be directed right into the magazine for equipment, articles and advertising, and also back to this site to help someone with their project.  I will not take if I can not give.  I will donate in the name of the magazine, We Are... Magazine.
  • The perks range from free digital issues and your name in the magazine for 6 months all the way to a year of free issues, a free print copy, your name as a contributor listed for the life of the magazine and 10% of total profit with a financial statement through December 2015!!
  • If I do not reach my goal, all funds I do receive will go towards the legal documents I have left to get and a less expensive program to publish the magazine, but I will not be able to offer print copies and streamline the process for a more efficient business model. 
  • I have done a lot of work and research on my project, I just need a little help!

The Impact

  • I can't remember the number of times I started talking to someone about something and we said to each other "so it's not just me!" and felt better that someone else was going through the same thing AND we discussed it and helped each other out!  This magazine can do that on a global level, and it can only grow over time.
  • I want more "real" in entertainment and information, not more "reality".  I want something positive out there that reaches out to men and women, parents and children.  Not all stories have a "happy ending" because not all life happenings have one, and I believe that will connect with people because it is honest.  
  • People will never be altered in photos, stories will not be changed to make them more interesting, attention grabbing and/or scandalous. We will not discuss the Hollywood crowd and their antics.  We will not put people up on a pedestal then attack them when they fall.  There will never be unauthorized stories or pictures. 
  • The advertising in the magazine will feature small businesses and private/family owned shops, no corporate advertising.  There will be a section of positive product reviews, or items that really work, and I will use the real/full name of the product.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please spread the word and visit the magazine's website too!  www.weare-magazine.com
  • Contact me through the above website for article ideas and new segments.
  • Together, we can make We Are... Magazine the best there is!
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools too!
  • Thank you in advance for any help you may be able to give- your time, your ideas, and donations as well.

story:
Por los últimos 15 años, el escultor y conferenciante, Luis Felipe Passalacqua, ha recorrido escuelas, universidades, centros de arte y sectores de la empresa privada, para divulgar su historia de vida y llevar un mensaje de empoderamiento. 

    Luis Felipe ilustraba libros de medicina, hasta que una meningitis lo dejó ciego. Sin embargo, este incidente no cegó su ojo creativo. Como escritor (publicado) y primer escultor invidente de Puerto Rico , ha logrado romper todo tipo de estereotipos y barreras, que le imponían por ser ciego. Enfrentó su ceguera con el arte y utiliza talleres de escultura, charlas y conferencias, para ayudar a otros a superar sus problemas .  (El Nuevo Día, 6/19/2016)


    

     A través de sus experiencias o realidades de vida, impacta y educa, muchas veces de manera libre y espontánea. Su formación desde niño, en campos tan diversos, como las artes plásticas, artes marciales, la danza, ciencias naturales y la espiritualidad, crean una combinación única, para el desarrollo de su nuevo libro. Tomando como base, no solamente sus experiencias de vida, sino también su profundo conocimiento espiritual y metafísico, Luis Felipe logra impartir consejos universales, dirigidos a una mejor vida o adelantamiento.



    En su autobiografía, él …una pequeña aclaración  (Authorhouse 2014), nos muestra el camino tortuoso y subliminal de su recorrido, desde una edad muy temprana y hasta el presente. Con la publicación de ILUMINA… TE,(Authorhouse 2016) compartirá información relevante, de nuestros procesos evolutivos, dirigidos a un mejor conocimiento de nuestro yo, y las diferentes posibilidades de superación o evolución individual.

 


PROCESO:

  •  La publicación de mi primer libro (él), se hizo realidad gracias a las aportaciones hechas por amigos, familiares y otros, a través de Indiegogo, en el 2014. Cada dólar fue utilizado para su producción y se encuentra en el mercado de libros, desde entonces. Disponible  a través de Authorhouse, Amazon, Barnes & Noble y otros.
  •  Al igual que el primero, estaré publicando ILUMINA …TE, con la asistencia  de AuthorHouse.
  •  El costo de $3,000.00 cubrirá los gastos de producción con AuthorHouse.  Esto incluye la compaginación del manuscrito, imagenes y portadas. No  incluye la impresión de libros, ya que se imprimen según su demanda en el  mercado (self publishing).
  •  Los costos por la edición y lectura del material, han sido donados.
  •  Este es un proyecto en proceso y el manuscrito será entregado a  AuthorHouse, en unos 30 días. Me gustaría tener el libro publicado (en la  calle) para octubre de 2016 o antes.



       Con tu ayuda, será posible crear este libro y llevar estos mensajes de apoyo, inspiración y humanismo, a todas las comunidades hispanoamericanas. Al igual que ocurrió con mi libro anterior (él …una pequeña aclaración), espero que este también sea escogido, para ser grabado en audio, por la Biblioteca del Congreso en Estados Unidos, más adelante.



RETOS:

  • Mi meta es de 45 días de campaña.
  • De no lograrse la cantidad de $3000, se utilizará la cantidad alcanzada (aportaciones) hasta ese punto, en la publicación del libro. 


OTRAS FORMAS DE COLABORAR:

  •  Puedes aportar la cantidad que desees, dólar a dólar se logró el primero.
  •  Hacer mucho ruido y compartir esta campaña en todas las redes sociales, con tus amistades, familiares, compañeros de trabajo y otros. (Busca las herramientas de “sharing” aquí mismo).
  • Recuerda que estos libros se publican a nivel mundial. No importa donde estés, puedes hacer una aportación a través de PayPal.
  • Envianos tus buenas vibras, pensamientos y comentarios por aquí.



¡GRACIAS!
