story:
IMPORTANT UPDATE: 

3/15/16: Thanks to our Launch Team we are about the exceed our funding goal. Reaching our STRETCH GOAL - $6,700 - will enable us to add the ability to read the book in the app as well as track how users use the app so we can learn how to best use the augmented reality. $10,000 would enable the user to take a selfie photo or video dancing with Pacha. 

3/10/16: We are now able to provide tax-deductible receipts for contributions larger than $250. Just add 7% to the amount (without shipping).  

3 TOP FAQs (More FAQs are below)

  1. What will you do with funds above $5000? We'll build a better app. We'd like to add the ability to read the book in the app, track how users use the app so we can learn how to best use the augmented reality, and enable the user to take a selfie photo or video dancing with 3D Pacha. 
  2. What is the problem you are solving? Most Children's Entertainment is mental junk food. It may satisfy cravings but it is making kids sick.
  3. Why should I support this project?  This project aims to catalyze a shift towards "nutritious" children's entertainment that supports the healthy social and emotional development of today's children. Our vision is for all kids to have access to mind blowing, culturally-relevant, age-appropriate entertainment as they develop into young adults.  

Hello from Melia, Aaron, Dre, Allah, David, and Dave!

Our groundbreaking Animated Book Pacha's Pajamas: A Story Written By Nature is being published on April 5th. We need your help to make the launch a resounding success.

The story of a young girl whose pajamas take her on dream adventures to learn more about herself and bring her unique gifts to the world...

We are doing this 5 day crowdfunding campaign because we need to finish development of the Pacha Alive app that animates the book. This campaign is a key part of gaining the momentum we need to make the Animated Book a bestseller. 

Now is the time to step up for children, innovation in reading, diversity in books, social and emotional learning, climate action, and Pachamama. If we can make Pacha's Pajamas a bestseller, it will clear a pathway for more healthy children's entertainment.  


  • We need a minimum of $5K to finish the development of the app. 
  • If we get $10K, we will add some more features to the app including the capability to take a selfie with Pacha and hire a couple of young people to do outreach for the best seller campaign. If we get more than $10K, we will put it into he bestseller campaign. 
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, whatever funds we get will be used to make the best app we can.
  • Be the first to get the new Pacha's Pajamas Animated Book. Our unique perks include 20 signed Pre-Release copies of Pacha's Pajamas that you will have before the April 5th publishing date. 
  • We also are offering the opportunity to be made into a cartoon character and even be in a short animation with Pacha.  


  • Our Animated Book inspires kids and families to discover their unique gifts and bring them to the world. It encourages them to explore their connection with the natural world and to create the world they want to live in. It also models youth leadership and climate action.
  • The Pacha's Pajamas music in the Animated Book has won 9 awards.

  • Our biggest risk is selecting an developer that is unable to deliver in time for the launch. To mitigate this risk, we are going through a rigorous selection process with support from the service Upwork.com.

  1. Join our Thunderclap campaign to get the word out.
  2. Send an email to your circle of friends sharing the campaign and/or sing them to pre-order the animated book. I will send you a blurb.  
  3. Pre-order the Animated Book on Amazon or another online retailer before April 12th
  4. Connect us with infuential people and organizations that may want to support the launch 
  5. Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign using the Indiegogo share tools!

  • What will you do with funds above $5000? 
    We'll build a better app. We'd like to add the ability to read the book in the app, track how users use the app so we can learn how to best use the augmented reality, and enable the user to take a selfie photo or video dancing with 3D Pacha.
  • What is the problem you are solving? Most Children's Entertainment is mental junk food. It may satisfy cravings but it is making kids sick.
  • Why should I support this project? This project aims to catalyze a shift towards "nutritious" children's entertainment that supports the healthy social and emotional development of today's children. Our vision is for all kids to have access to mind blowing, culturally-relevant, age-appropriate entertainment as they develop into young adults.  
  • Why are you doing only a 5 day campaign?
    We need to get the app started as soon as possible so that it is ready in time for the book release. Look out for an article about short crowdfunding campaigns called Crowdfunding in  a Pinch that Dave is going to write. 
  • What is Nutritious Children's Entertainment? 
    Nutritious children's entertainment supports the healthy social and emotional development of today's kids, recognizing that today's kids are the first growing up as digital natives. What medicine do they need? What medicine are they getting? What kind of messages do you want your kids to be exposed hours a day? That's nutritious children's entertainment. Not only does it taste great, but its good for kids. 
  • What is impact of the augmented reality?
    As in the Animated book, multimedia technologies like augmented reality can increase story comprehension and expressive vocabulary especially for disadvantaged children according a  2015 Leiden University study.
  • What did the 2015 Leiden University study find?
    It found additional benefit in technology for story comprehension and expressive vocabulary. Multimedia features like animated pictures, music, and sound effects were found beneficial. In contrast, interactive elements like hotspots, games, and dictionaries were found to be distracting. Especially for children disadvantaged because of less stimulating family environments, multimedia features were helpful and interactive features were detrimental. 
  • When will I get my Pachamas?  
    See http://pachaspajamas.com/pachamas-update
  • What if I have a question not on this list?
    Send us questions to info@pachaspajamas.com

story:
IMPORTANT:

To get your copy of "The Two Loves of the Buttercup" be sure to select the perk "Get the Book!" on the menu to the right!

The story behind the story... it's been a long time in the making!

My name is Patrick Kellegher. I am an Irish native, from County Longford, living in Manchester City in the UK.

Since I've been a kid I've been scribbling down my thoughts and  ideas on whatever comes to hand... napkins, receipts, old shoe boxes, you never know when inspiration will strike! This is how the 'Farmer's Garden' series, a collection of four short stories, one for each of the seasons, came to be written.

Scraps of scribbled on paper, collected and hoarded like tiny jigsaw pieces over twenty years, finally pieced together. And so NOW (deep breath, long exhale...)  is the time to share them with YOU, the world, and I need YOUR HELP to do it...

Spring, 'The Two Loves of the Buttercup is the first in the series "to peep its tiny head out excitedly, to catch its first glimpses of the world".The tale of a beautiful buttercup who is adored by the wind and loved by the rain... but who will she choose?

A love story to connect you with the simplicity of the natural world, and the wondrous web of creation to which we are all bound.

What I Need & What You Get

Self-published hardback books must be printed in bulk to make them the most economical. With the funding I raise from this campaign, I will prepare and place a bulk order of 1000 books, as well as other goodies I will be giving away through this campaign. Here is the general cost breakdown:

Illustrations (£2,300)

Design/Layout (£750)

Printing of 1000 books (£2,950)

Publishing Costs / ISBNs / Barcode (£350)

Other, to-be-determined costs include the production of the giveaway postcards and e-books, shipping, Indiegogo listing fee, and marketing of the book. 

Meeting my funding goal will jumpstart the self-publication process and allow contributors to get their hands on a signed copy of the book before it's made available to the general public. Funds raised beyond £7500 will go straight towards printing fees for additional hard copies of the book. 

Risks & Challenges

Although this is my first time publishing a book, I've got t a great network of experienced and talented people behind me. Caitriona has completed the storyboard for the 20 Illustrations and the first 3 have already been completed.  Everything is set, and ready to go... 

My major priority is shipping a high quality book to my backers, so barring any unfortunate printing disasters we anticipate the book will be in your hands in mid November, just in time for those Christmas stockings...

Other Ways You Can Help

I hope you are as excited about The Two Loves of the Buttercup as I am, and are eager to support it. Of course, you may be excited but unable to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

Crowd-Funding is driven by word of mouth. If you find this project worthy, please help us get the word out by sharing this campaign page.

Indiegogo makes this even easier via its share tools! Check them out!

story:
Signs of God Project & Photo Book

Signs of God is a project about how God shows up all around us as we walk through our everyday life and how sharing those moments with others celebrates His Grace. The project was born out of a cross country road trip where the founder and his family kept remarking on the abundance of images celebrating God and His love.  They started taking pictures of church signs and crosses and tattoos and highway signs all along the way. These Signs of God they saw all across America inspired them to create a photo sharing app called Divinely to give Christians a way to share their own "Signs of God".

Divinely reached out to the Christian community allowing them to share their photos and insert scripture or request prayers for their loved ones and be inspired. With thousands of photos it felt divinely inspired to create a book for the Christian community and further develop of the Signs of God project.

Since the Divinely app was released on iOS almost 3 years ago the world of app development has grown tremendously. Often referred to as a Christian Instagram, the app needs to catch up with the times and be refined along with fulfilling plans to launch an android version in 2016.

I am Rev. Todd Weatherly and one thing I believe is that, as Christians, we see God everywhere. I got involved with the "Signs of God" project because I wanted to be able to help our world see more of God in everyday life. We have so much tragedy, suffering, and grief in the world that it seems the only way to start turning the tide is to intentionally begin seeing God everywhere.

Our goal is to raise enough in our campaign to publish our “Signs of God Across America” photo book and use the proceeds from sales to develop the apps and a company web platform so that these Signs of God can be received and shared to help Christians find fellowship and churches connect to a broader community of faith.

As the success of the project grows the long term plan is to establish a non-profit foundation that funds church projects and relief efforts throughout the country and the world. Supporting this project requires very little from the individual but with enough supporters, could grow to be a powerful expression of faith for the Christian community.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Beaulah, I'm the author of the Silver Hawk, a sci fi / fantasy novel set in a world where women are in charge and men must find a way to fight for equal rights. Over the past year, I have discovered that there are lots of other authors like me in Christchurch who have a story they are passionate about but no idea how to get it in front of an audience.

Self-publishing is often a lonely and difficult road, so together with Angela, author of Aroha's Grand Adventure, I have set up a group called the Christchurch Writer's Guild to connect all of us authors together - a chance for us to share skills and talents and a reminder that we are not alone!

The Armageddon Expo (similar to ComicCon) is a huge opportunity for us to get our books out there and make some noise, but we can't do it without your help.

All we need to be able to get our books in front of people at the Armageddon Expo is $300 for a table and $300 for marketing material (for people to take away even if they don't buy a book) & an EFTPOS machine (hardly anyone has enough cash at these things). Please note, all contributions through this site are in USD.

* Each author is funding the printing and shipping of their own books (upwards of $400 each).

Thank you so much for your help and support!

Please consider sharing this campaign with your friends and we look forward to seeing you at Armageddon!

 

<3 Beaulah

story:
Thank you so much to those who pledged! Because of you, I am on my way to attending the Writers Workshop in Paris. 

Visit my blog for updates on my trip. 

http://coreymp.wordpress.com/

Almost three years ago, I was diagnosed with Trigeminal Neuralgia, a rare nerve disorder that causes debilitating pain. Last November, thanks to my wonderful neurosurgeon, and the support and love of my family, I got my life back after undergoing a successful brain surgery. With all that behind me, I am ready to embrace life and chase my dream of becoming a published writer.

Hi. My name is Corey. I am a stay-at-home mom, writer and blogger. I wrote my first poem at 14 years old. Poetry was my first love. Years later, I discovered my passion for writing stories. I’m currently in the process of editing my first novel and in the midst of writing my second one.

For the last two years, I have been dreaming of going to Paris to attend a Writers Workshop and to finish writing my second novel, which takes place in the City of Light. I am excited to announce that now that I am pain-free, I am finally going to Paris this June, but for a limited time and on a limited budget. I still need a little more support, which is why I created my writing campaign called, Poetry for Paris.

Poetry for Paris aims to help me raise funds to make this writing trip happen. The idea is I will write a poem for each person who pledges at least $25. Each poem will be featured on my blog at: coreymp.wordpress.com.

Where the money goes:
The money I hope to raise will go towards the workshop fee (650 Euro = approximately 850 in US Dollar). I am hoping to raise $800 before June.

If I exceed my goal, the rest of the money raised will go towards editing services for one of my books.

The perks!
Depending on your pledge, the perks could include a poem written by me, especially for you, or a dvd of my favorite movie, Midnight in Paris and/or a book from Shakespeare and Company with a personal dedication from me, and/or I name a character in my book after you!

Aside from attending the workshop, any free time I get during my short stay in Paris, will be dedicated to finishing my second novel, Hearts and Errors. I am hoping that a glimpse of the city, a quick stroll along the Seine river, a few cups of coffee at Café de Flore, possibly a nightcap at the Shakespeare and Company bookstore, will be all I need to fill the holes in my story.

Hearts and Errors is about a hopeless romantic from Manhattan who flees to Paris in search of a Matchmaker she read about in an old magazine article.

Leaving everything behind, with nothing but a suitcase and a broken heart, she desperately walks the streets of Paris hoping to find what she thinks she is looking for, but fate has other plans.

May I write you a poem?
If you pledge at least $25, I will write a poem, especially for you. Just give me your first name and one word (maybe your favorite word, or any word). All poems will be featured on a page on my blog called, Poetry for Paris. Look for your poem under your name.

Although I have not written a poem in years, I am willing to take a risk and pour my heart out in order to reach my goal. Any pledge would mean the world to me. Thank you for your support.

Check my blog for updates on my upcoming trip.

“Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.”
T.S. Eliot

story:
Stell dir vor:

Du bist im Moseltal unterwegs und hast dich auf einer Weinprobe in einen exklusiven deutschen Riesling verliebt. Dein Auto ist leider voll mit Kindern und Gepäck – aber der Winzer ist gerne bereit, dir ein paar Kisten nach Hause zu schicken. Und das auch noch zu einem Superpreis. Allerdings lohnt sich für ihn der Versand erst ab 500 Flaschen. 

Wie gut dass es Crowdla gibt.

Du startest ein Angebot und jeder der Lust hat auf guten Wein beteiligt sich an der Charge.

Das ist gut für dich, gut für andere Weinfreunde und gut für den Winzer. 

Wie sind wir auf die Idee gekommen?

Durch die Begriffe "Mindestabnahmemenge" und "Mindermengenzuschlag"welche bei Produzenten oder Herstellern gängig ist. Als Endverbraucher, kleiner Fisch und kleiner Zwischenhändler, zahlen wir oft weitaus höhere Preise für unsere Produkte, als die großen Fische wie z.b. Supermarktketten.

Das Fazit liegt nahe: Kleine Endverbraucher und Zwischenhändler müssen sich zusammentun und gemeinsam einkaufen um bessere Preise an den Märkten zu erzielen.

Unsere Online-Plattform nutzt das Internet, um Endverbrauchern und Zwischenhändlern ein Forum zu bieten, in dem sie sich als Kaufgemeinschaften zusammenschliessen und so ihre Produkte billiger bekommen als im Einzelhandel. Oder einfach gesagt: Wenn wir (Endverbraucher und Zwischenhändler) als Gruppe einkaufen, bekommen wir mehr für unser Geld.

Dies ist Euer Forum, von Verbrauchern und Zwischenhändlern für Verbraucher und Zwischenhändler. Zusammen nutzen wir das Internet, so dass wir letztendlich alle zu Grosshandelspreisen einkaufen können, und so die überhöhten Preise im Einzelhandel nicht länger in Kauf nehmen müssen. So werden wir nicht nur die besten Preise bekommen, letztlich werden wir als Verbraucher auch die Preise und Bedingungen mitbestimmen können, indem wir den Verkaufsketten durch unsere Kaufgemeinschaften Konkurrenz machen.

Hört sich unrealistisch oder gar unmöglich an? Wir, das Crowdla Team, wissen es ist nicht nur möglich, es ist sogar höchste Zeit, dass wir unsere Social Media Networks dazu benutzen, nicht länger nur willige Opfer der Preispolitik der Grosskonzerne zu sein sondern aktiv in offenen und fliessenden Interessengemeinschaften jeweils die besten und nachhaltigsten Märkte und Preise zu finden.   

Clickt auf unser Video, dann seht ihr an konkreten Beispielen, wie ihr profitieren und wie ihr das Projekt unterstützen könnt, damit es nicht nur eine schöne Idee bleibt sondern unsere Zukunft wird, in der wir als Kunden und Verbraucher das Sagen haben.

Wir wollen in erster Linie, fair trade, organische und ökologische Produkte unterstützen und hoffen insbesondere Öko-Bauern und Anbietern aus der sogenannten dritten Welt mit diesem Forum direkten Kontakt zu den Endverbrauchern zu ermöglichen, so dass beide Seiten direkt profitieren können. Wir können gleichzeitig unserer Umwelt helfen, indem wir Transportkosten und CO2 Emissionen reduzieren. Indem wir direkt von der Quelle einkaufen, vermeiden wir Unmengen an Plastikverpackungen und Müll.

Wir benötigen:

  • eine übersichtlich programmierte Website auf der sich Gemeinschaften bilden können.
  • Juristen für Wirtschaftsrecht bzw. Onlinerecht (damit uns die Großen Fische der Industrie nicht mit Unterlassungsklagen oder dergleichen zu Fischfutter verarbeiten.)
  • 2-3 Mieten für unsere Büroräume. Im Augenblick passiert alles in meinem Wohnzimmer ; ((
  • Viele tolle Kommentare auf Facebook, Twitter, Youtube und Indiegogo

 

Und letztlich eure finanzielle Unterstützung für dieses Projekt!!!

 

    ... natürlich sind wir dankbar für jede finanzielle Unterstützung, die ihr uns geben könnt – ob mit 5 oder 500 Euro – jeder Betrag zeigt uns, dass wir euch erreicht haben, und ihr mit uns an dieses Projekt glaubt!

Unsere Stärke und unser Erfolg liegen in der “Community”. Indem wir uns zu Gruppen zusammentun, schwimmen wir nicht länger hilflos als kleine Fische im grossen Konsumteich herum, sondern bestimmen unseren Kurs selbst!

Und jetzt brauchen wir Eure Hilfe, ob ihr uns bei Facebook “mögt”, auf Twitter folgt, oder uns finanziell oder mit Rat und Tat und postivien Kommentaren unterstützt – alles zählt und alles ist wichtig!

Ein warmes, von Herzen kommendes Danke an jeden einzelnen von Euch, dass ihr euch die Zeit genommen habt, unsere Vision zu teilen. Wir hoffen, der Funke ist übergesprungen!

Euer Crowdla-Team

 

Weitere Informationen findet ihr oben bei den "Updates" oder auf:

www.crowdla.com

https://twitter.com/crowdla

www.facebook.com/pages/Crowdla/382803415124779

(Den facebook Link kopiert besser in die Adresszeile eures Browsers oder scrollt einfach ganz runter-Dort findet ihr noch einmal alle Links in die Social-Network Welt.)

 

International Version:

We have created an online platform as a place for people to come together and buy products collectively in bigger quantities so that they will ultimately have to pay less for each item they purchase.

In the above video we demonstrate how this works, how each of you might benefit and why we need all the support we can get in order for our idea to work!

Our aim is to get this off the ground without borrowing money as we want to stay independent from big corporates and their business policies, that are ultimately all about maximising profits and filling their own pockets.

We know this sounds strange and unusual but we believe that it is not only possible but neccessary to find new business models that focus on the best interest of the end consumer!
 
The commissions on our site will be as close to non-profit as possible in order to pass all the benefits on to you and to give everybody the opportunity to post their products .
 
We will promote and post mainly fairtrade, organic, and ecologically sound products and are aiming to give organic farmers and participants from the so called third world a chance to offer their products directly to you -the consumers- without a chain of big corporates in between adding and taking all the profits.
 
In order to achieve this, we need:
  • A clear and simple website with an easy interface to accomodate crowds and traffic.

  • Lawyers or experts in business/economics, most specifically internet business laws so we can avoid lawsuits from big corporates who want us out of their fish pond or dead in the water!

  • 2-3 months rental for appropriate offices, as everything is happening in our living room at the moment
  • Sustencance (food and drink mainly) for our team to keep spirits up until the site is working
  • Most of all we need your comments and support on facebook, twitter and indiegogo.
  • ... and of course all the financial help we can get!!!.
This is going to be an entire new and ground breaking way of shopping without middle-man, where supplier and consumer both benefit and nobody else makes unethically high profits!

We are conscious of our environment help to protect the earth by reducing transport and Co2 emissions. By leaving out the big corporates and selling directly from the suppliers, we are going to reduce the mountain of discarded wrapping created by big marketing companies to sell products in retail outlets! 

Our planet does not need more plastic!!!

And while helping our planet you can save money at the same time because we get better prices through buying bigger quantities directly from the suppliers.
 
Through operating a crowd, we will give more power to the small fish in the big pond and escape from the fangs of the big fish!

Simply put: People with less money can afford more if they buy in a group.

And now we need each and everyone of you! 

There is still lots that needs to be done. Its up to all of us start acting!

We want to thank each and everyone of you for your support, whether it's a simple click on facebook or Twitter. great comments, valuable advise, donations or moral support by talking about us to your friends and everyone you meet - all over the planet!!!!

A warm and heart felt thank you.

Your Crowdla-Team

Du bist im Moseltal unterwegs und hast dich auf einer Weinprobe in einen exklusiven deutschen Riesling verliebt. Dein Auto ist leider voll mit Kindern und Gepäck – aber der Winzer ist gerne bereit, dir ein paar Kisten nach Hause zu schicken. Und das auch noch zu einem Superpreis. Allerdings lohnt sich für ihn der Versand erst ab 500 Flaschen. 
Wie gut dass es Crowdla gibt.
Du startest ein Angebot und jeder der Lust hat auf guten Wein beteiligt sich an der Charge.
Das ist gut für dich, gut für andere Weinfreunde und gut für den Winzer. 
Wie sind wir auf die Idee gekommen?
Durch die Begriffe "Mindestabnahmemenge" und "Mindermengenzuschlag"welche bei Produzenten oder Herstellern gängig ist. Als Endverbraucher, kleiner Fisch und kleiner Zwischenhändler, zahlen wir oft weitaus höhere Preise für unsere Produkte, als die großen Fische wie z.b. Supermarktketten.
Das Fazit liegt nahe: Kleine Endverbraucher und Zwischenhändler müssen sich zusammentun und gemeinsam einkaufen um bessere Preise an den Märkten zu erzielen.
Unsere Online-Plattform nutzt das Internet, um Endverbrauchern und Zwischenhändlern ein Forum zu bieten, in dem sie sich als Kaufgemeinschaften zusammenschliessen und so ihre Produkte billiger bekommen als im Einzelhandel. Oder einfach gesagt: Wenn wir (Endverbraucher und Zwischenhändler) als Gruppe einkaufen, bekommen wir mehr für unser Geld. story:
“My opinion is that Laksmidevi’s consciousness while cooking was the main ingredient to make her dishes so incredible. It would be a great joy for me to share her vegetarian delicacies with everyone."



My dear friends,

It is with great pleasure that I want to introduce to you a very special project that my mother, Laksmidevi, left unfinished. 

Everyone that knows her well or heard about her, knows that she was a great and devoted cook that wrote and published one successful cooking book. Before her unexpected death, she was preparing a new book filled with joyful recipes. She had the brilliant idea of compiling 12 menus of vegetarian and vegan dishes for the readers in need of some creativity to enjoy a very rich and complete meal.

After many months of intensively testing the recipes and photographing the dishes, the book is finally complete, ready to be edited and published. It is a fully vegetarian book with influences of mediterranean and indian cuisine. The recipes are opulent but easy to follow.


"...just as Laksmidevi began the compilation of her recipes in Krishna consciousness—with love and devotion for her family members, devotees, and others—so her daughter, Jahnavi, has completed the work in Krishna consciousness, with special love and affection for her mother." Giriraj Swami



How can you help?


It is at this point that I kindly want to ask you all for your help, even if it is just with your sincere blessings or just by sharing this link with your friends.

There is only one step left to make her wish come true and that requires funding the printing and translation of the books. I humbly request you to remember the importance of this project for her, but at the same time the influence that this book will have on people's lives. With her incredible and palatable recipes people will definitely keep an open attitude towards vegetarianism and veganism.

I am trying to raise 5000 euros to cover the printing and translation of the books. I realize everyone has different financial possibilities but every single cent is welcomed.

Thank you all so much for dedicating your time in reading my request.

For more information please contact me by email: menus.e.mimos@gmail.com

Jahnavi


"I personally was very fortunate to stay at the home of Laksmidevi, Nityananda, and their children in Oporto, Portugal... Even now, the experience of their kindness, hospitality, affection, and eagerness to serve is fresh and vivid in my mind. It is something I wish everyone could experience, and my hope is that the readers of this book, especially as they prepare the dishes in the recipes, will experience some of Laksmidevi’s love and affection."
Giriraj Swami


In loving memory of Laksmidevi...

story:
What is the Series about?

This is a young adult science fiction series that follows 22 year-old Katerina in her journey to find her brother when she wakes up 500 years in the future. She finds his letter and sets out to find him,  falling in with a crew of smugglers and treasure hunters.

NOTE: If you head to my website jillianashe.com contact me if you're interested and I'll send you the first book FREE, Let me know if you want if for Kindle (Kindle likes to be special and require its own file) or any other reader (everyone else uses the same file) It's available pretty much everywhere, but might not be free. I have to fight Amazon and Nook to price match Kobo and iBooks, so it takes some time to filter through.

The description for My Delicate Destruction: Book One of the Wolfegang series - 

"My name is Katerina Anderson. In 2016, a drug called Hope was created. Administered during suspended animation, the drug was supposed to cure the cancer my twin brother and I had. When an earthquake leveled Los Angeles, we were presumed dead.

Forgotten, we slept.

The day I woke up, I realized everything had changed. My brother was missing, and everyone else I knew was dead. That drug and all its false promises were the beginning of my destruction."

                                                                     ***

My Delicate Destruction, a 150-page novella, is the first book in the Wolfegang Series.

This book is published and available on Kindle, Kobo, Nook, and iBooks. I'm hoping to publish the second and third book in the summer of 2014.

Description for Shadows in Darkness: Book Two of the Wolfegang series - 

Description for Riding on Whispers: Book Three of the Wolfegang series -


  • My name is Jillian Ashe, and I am the author of this series. I'm hoping to write a full series of about ten books plus a few short stories that focus on each character. This series will happen no matter what, but with your contributions I can make sure there are no delays with the publication process.
  • Being an author has always been a dream of mine, and this was my first series. I want to tell it so badly, and to have you all read it. It's the story that I've wanted to read, but could never find while wandering the stacks in the bookstore. I've been told by complete strangers they loved the story, and that means more to me than anything ever could.
  • With your contributions it will keep me working, and able to pay people,  and pay for all those little things you never knew about.

What We Need & What You Get

I can give you the story in raw, unedited format. That's how much this series means to me, getting it out no matter what. But...I want the experience of reading the series to be as pleasant as possible. I myself am an avid reader. I love fawning over a cover, reading the story, almost never tripping up over a typo (It happens in the big books more than you would think) and the rest of the world falling away. Here's what I need to give you that enjoyable experience:

  • Editing - I'm not perfect. Sometimes what I send my editor is a far cry from the end product, and I need the funds to make sure the editor is paid. Without their help the books wouldn't be nearly as neat and clean, therefore not that enjoyable. Editors are worth the money.
  • Stock Images - Yes I make my own book covers to save money, but I am woefully under-prepared to create the good quality images my readers deserve. It's pretty expensive, but I want those awesome science fiction backgrounds for you just as much as it's for me.
  • Website fees - I purchased my own website domain and hosting site so it will always be there... as long as I keep paying my yearly fees. I keep my website up and running so my readers can stay connected to me, buy from me directly, and get cool free stuff.
  •  ISBNs and Copyrights - Not too expensive, but adds up when you have to do it for each book and for each version. Digital ISBNs aren't always offered for free like they are when you do a print book on Amazon. This is so other people can find my work easier (ISBNs) and so other people can't try to sue me over my own stuff (copyrights).
  • Perks and shipping - I will be initially paying for all the physical copies of the books, posters, etc. as well as the shipping to get them to me so that I can get ship them out to you. I do use priority flat rate shipping though so keep that in mind.
  • Fees, fees, and more fees - Indiegogo takes a percentage, the credit card companies take a percentage, Paypal takes a percentage....you get the idea.

I tried to price each perk fairly so that all of the costs of each perk and the fees are covered with only a little extra to pay for the real purpose of the campaign. This is also a kind of "pre-order" for book 2 and 3 of the series. They will release no matter what, but the funds you contribute to receive them before their true release date will help book 4 and 5 come out on time.

Perks

I currently don't ship internationally through Indiegogo because it's expensive and stressful, BUT if you really want it and live out of the US you can go to my website jillianashe.com and contact me. We can work it out on a person by person basis :). 

  • To be clear on the last perk...you get every eBook I publish in the Wolfegang series...plus what the physical hardbacks of the first three books. I will personally sign each copy. It's a commitment to the series as a whole, so beware.

Risks

I personally don't see any risks as these three books will be published this summer regardless of any contributions. If you contribute, you will get the perk you contributed for regardless of if I make my goal or not. Nothing to lose, just saying :)

Stretch Goal

If I pass my goal listed above I will send everyone who contributed the eBook copy of a short story in the series based on one of my main characters. It is an "Origin" story, and you will receive it early just like everything else!

Other Ways to Contribute

Not everyone can afford to contribute, and I totally get that, but spread the word! Share the link, thrust it upon the readers in your life who like this kind of thing. Tell them about my the first book being free if they contact me through my website! Be excited! I love books, and people who love books can't shut up about their obsessions :)

Thank you to everyone who took the time to read this far!

It's a commitment to the series as a whole, so beware.RisksI personally don't see any risks as these three books will be published this summer regardless of any contributions. If you contribute, you will get the perk you contributed for regardless of if I make my goal or not. Nothing to lose, just saying :)Stretch GoalIf I pass my goal listed above I will send everyone who contributed the eBook copy of a short story in the series based on one of my main characters. It is an "Origin" story, and you will receive it early just like everything else!Other Ways to ContributeNot everyone can afford to contribute, and I totally get that, but spread the word! Share the link, thrust it upon the readers in your life who like this kind of thing. Tell them about my the first book being free if they contact me through my website! Be excited! I love books, and people who love books can't shut up about their obsessions :)Thank you to everyone who took the time to read this far!

story:
Hello.

My name is Eveline, and I'm 17 years old. Last year, I was diagnosed with PTSD and dissociative spells due to repeated trauma. This means that I often blank out for minutes at a time, and am unable to hear or participate consciously in daily life during the episode. In addition, I have panic attacks, flashbacks, nightmares, and a massive problem with hyper vigilance. This makes it very difficult for me to be at home, as I have to do routine safety checks every time I leave or enter a room, right before I go to bed, and as soon as I wake up. I am terrified of being alone in public, in fear that I will experience the same kind of trauma again, and usually only leave the house alone to go to school. I have tried various medicines, but the side effects have always outweighed the benefits they offer.

A few weeks ago, my psychologist recommended I get a service dog. I found and contacted an organization, ProTrain Dog, and met with them. They paired me with a very sweet long-haired German Shepherd named Nassa. We bonded right away, and I immediately felt more at ease. She sat at my feet and kept a watchful eye on everyone around me while my grandparents and I spoke with her trainers.

Unfortunately, my grandparents are both retired, and can't afford to pay for her training. Because of my school schedule(8am to 5pm) and debilitating fear, I am unable to get a job to pay for her. 

I need Nassa trained to lick my hand or face right before I have a dissociative episode, to do safety checks, and to bark on command if strangers become invasive, or if I feel unsafe. This is incredibly important to me, because it would allow me to go about everyday activities without constant fear. Additionally, she would alert me of dissociative episodes before they happen, allowing me to combat them or prevent them.  This would help me immensely, as it would allow me to maintain friendships and future business relationships without dropping out of conversations or being unable to hear or remember what the person is telling me. 

Because of the personal and complicated tasks Nassa will be trained to do, she will cost $10,500. Included in this cost is Nassa herself, her training, and her certification. $3,000 of this is due up front, when we sign her contract. My grandparents are able to pay for this, but their funds don't extend much farther. Nassa will complete her training two months after the contract is signed. At this point, the remaining balance of $7,500 is due.

If we don't reach the goal, the raised money will be used to buy a puppy, which will be raised and then taken to ProTrain to be trained as a service dog. This costs less, but it would take over a year for the dog to mature and be trained. Nassa is a year old as of now. She was raised by ProTrain, and has already gone through basic training and housebreaking, so her service dog training will take a lot less time than a dog that I bring to them. I need my dog as soon as possible, and unfortunately the other dog would not be trained before I go off to college.

If you can't contribute, that is okay. If you'd like to help, you can share this on any social networking site.

Nassa's trainers can be found at:

http://www.protraindog.com 

Thank you so very much for reading this.


(Note: This picture is not of Nassa, but is of a dog that looks exactly like her, named Noelle von Pasadena. The image source, along with her adoption information, can be found at http://www.sheprescue.org/Noelle%20von%20Pasadena.html )

story:
Short Summary

Healthy Tomorrow is an American non-profit that fights against female genital mutilation (FGM) in Mali and beyond.  

This is our old campaign.  Our new campaign is called Ending female genital mutilation, FGM, in Mali.  It's at http://igg.me/at/stopfgmnow.

Our partner group in Mali, Sini Sanuman, organizes many public meetings at which they have collected over 60,000 signatures on the Pledge Against Excision, which they are using to try to get a law enacted against FGM. 

They also put music videos on TV like the one above, which we helped create.  This video by Adama Yalomba has been shown over 100 times on Africable TV, which reaches 20 million people in 10 countries.  At the beginning of the video, the woman singer is insulted, being called un-excised, and she says she's happy about that, after which her popular husband gives her a thumbs-up.  Sini Sanuman also puts songs on the radio from the album "Stop Excision" produced by Healthy Tomorrow president Susan McLucas in 2000.

Sini Sanuman has convinced 11 villages to stop excising their girls.  Over 150 excisers have given up the practice on the basis of education from the group.  Many of them are our most passionate spokespeople. 

Religious leaders are an important part of our campaign, with quotes from famous preachers on our hand-out and some imams preaching against FGM in their mosques on a regular basis.

We have a series of posters up around Bamako and beyond that show famous Malians who are against FGM, the head of the "griots" association (traditional story tellers and very influential mediators), famous artists, a village chief of one of the villages that have stopped excising, etc.  These posters also appear as bill boards around the country. 

For $100, a music video can be played on TV for 4 million people to see

$5 puts a song from "Stop Excision" on a radio station where thousands will hear it

$65 pays for an outing for 2 people to a village to spread our message

$25 pays for a public meeting in town

$25 pays for a meeting with an exciser or a religious leader

$370 buys a bill board for a year, showing famous Malians opposed to FGM

With the money we raise, we will put music videos on TV and songs on the radio, support public meetings both in town and in villages, private meetings with excisers and religious leaders, put up 3 bill boards, and continue to push for a law against FGM.

Read more about our work on our website: StopExcision.net.

If you can't contribute, please let other people know about our work.  We appreciate any help you can give us to get rid of this custom, which is so damaging to girls and women.

story:
(preliminarna napomena financijsko-navigacijske naravi: indiegogo.com je crowdfunding platforma usmjerena na raznolike inicijative - s obzirom na to da publicistika nudi stvaran predmet kao protutežu kontribuciji, predlažemo vam da pogledajte 'perks' (stupac desno) pa radije kupite knjigu nego donirajte isti iznos ...)


Pogledajte 1. poglavlje romana i još malo ulomaka (ovdje) ... 

(DOPUNJENO!)


Zašto "Ja nisam Švabo!" jesam ovdje?

A zašto ne? Ovo je sasvim poštena ponuda gdje roman nastaje samo ako čitatelj to želi i - samim time - samo ako je autor siguran da će uspjeti podmiriti troškove tiskanja i distribucije romana.

To stvara opuštenost koja uopće ne djeluje loše na spisateljsko nagnuće, a spremnost čitateljstva da financira izlaženje romana jest dodatni motiv, zapravo bveza da se roman dovrši. Naime, čitav reputacijski, pa i financijski rizik je na strani autora. 

Međutim, ono najbolje što se dade dobiti iz ovakvoga načina financiranja jest stvaranje neovisne pozicije prema službenoj kritičarskoj, distribucijskoj i tiskarskoj struci. Pisac odgovara čitatelju, "proizvođač" ima obvezu prema "kupcu" koji - kao što je ponuđeno u načinima financiranja ("perks") -  može u odgovarajućoj mjeri utjecati i na sadržaj romana.

Kakav roman jesam "Ja nisam Švabo!"?

Glavni lik romana je Eugen Udo Schläger - uspješan inženjer strojarstva, specijaliziran za vjetroturbine, viceprvak Njemačke u orijentacijskom trčanju, ekološki aktivist angažiran na održanju rijetkih vrsta, ljubitelj leptira ... Njegov miran život prestaje nakon što mu majka ostavlja oporučno pismo u kojemu mu priznanje kako Herbert Schläger nije njegov otac "Ti nisi Švabo ... tvoj otac zove se Tvrtko Batina iz mjesta Batina u Hrvatskoj, u Dalmatinskoj Zagori".

Udo kreće u potragu za korijenima, ali u Batini su manje-više svi Batine, a ni Tvrtko nije samo jedan. U ozračju karikaturalnih kulturoloških razlika te lokalnih, nacionalnih, običajnih i osobnih razmirica Udo se pokušava orijentirati. U dramatičnom košmaru pristajanja da vidi sebe u jednima i istodobnog poricanja da se prepozna u drugima, Udo se, tražeći oca, suočava čak i s bratoubilačkim, pače i  incestuoznim nagnućima.

Obitelj ne možeš birati, ali u njegovu slučaju barem joj se možeš nadati - svaki trenutak njegovog traganja za identitetom je istodobno i odmicanje i primicanje od cilja.

Udo razotkriva Batinu, ali i Batina razotkriva njega. Tko je brži? Tko će prvi uzviknuti  "Udo Schläger je Batina!"

"Ja nisam Švabo!", ali tko jest tvoj autor?

Zovem se Vedran Kukavica. U 49.-oj sam  godini. Pedeset ću imati 31. listopada ove godine pa stječući tako većinsko vlasništvo nad vlastitim životom (50+1) želim taj dan obilježiti i izlaskom svog prvog romana "Ja nisam Švabo".

Bavio sam se novinarstvom - pisanim i televizijskim - marketingom, odnosima s javnošću i srodnim djelatnostima koje - po mom mišljenju - u današnjim prilikama ne pristaju odraslim osobama te ih u zrelijim godinama treba svakako gledati izbjeći ako baš nije nužno za preživljavanje.

O meni ćete štošta saznati koristeći internetske tražilice i moje javne profile na društvenim mrežama. Tamo i ovdje saznat ćete učas i kako ćete me kontaktirati. Ono što ne znate jest imam li ja doista ovaj roman u glavi, mogu li napisati dobru knjigu koju biste baš htjeli pročitati, dapače financirati.

Ja sam uvjeren da mogu, znam i hoću.

Izići ću lako na kraj sa svojim likovima, ugođajima, dijalozima i oporim humorom ovoga romana koji se krčka u mojim perifernim radnim memorijama desetljećima. "Ja nisam Švabo" - to je roman kojim ću pokazati kako fabula može biti pomalo banalna, a da poruka svejedno ostane duboka, kako se i nad šašavom stripovskom dinamikom priče može pustiti suza, kako baš svaki dijalekt može biti univerzalan i operativan, a kako mnoga emocija zna postati priličito neumjesna.

Riskirajmo zajedno! Nemojte da jednom čujete kako netko drugi govori vašim unucima:

"Sinko, bez mene onaj roman "Ja nisam Švabo" Vedrana Kukavice nikad ne bi izišao!"

Što sve jesam "Ja nisam Švabo!" ?

Riječ je o relativno opsežnom romanu (cca 250 stranica) koji sadrži i dodatke: "Usporedbeni riječnik gornjebatinačkog i velikobatinačkog izričaja", "Popis stanovništva Gornje i Velike Batine s nužnim opaskama" te "Nadzemno-podzemni zemljovid Gornje i Velike Batine pa i šire"

Pogledajte 1. poglavlje i nekoliko ulomaka (ovdje)

(DOPUNJENO!)

story:
The book

Geography of Attraction is a collection of my erotic short stories. I'd like to think they are better written than Fifty Shades of Grey, but you can be the judge.

I am the international editor of the Erotic Review Magazine in London. My stories, erotic and otherwise, have been published in many anthologies and magazines. But this is the first book that is going to home only my stories. 

Your contribution will mean that I will be able to realise this dream that has been jailed inside me for years. 

The community

I also want to use this opportunity to  create a community in which everybody can share erotic stories, images and artworks and a platform to openly discuss sex. Here is the Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/GeographyofAttraction

Why now?

Human sexuality is a common language across the world. Yet, even today, many find it hard to talk about it, to cherish it as it deserves. Enough of the hush-hush! Let's change it. Let's remove the awkwardness and replace it with openness. I am starting with fiction, but hey, there is no limit.

Your support

Make as much noise as you can about the campaign. Share it widely on Facebook and Twitter. Tell your friends. Pick a perk or two.

story:
Story of My Book - Mirror Mania

This book explores the intersection of body image insecurities and personal identity. It highlights just how much people tend to define their personal worth, and thus, the way they live their lives by a mere number on the scale. It explores how much media, specifically social media, has an influence on what we perceive as healthy.

My name is Roveena Jassal and I am the author of Mirror Mania. For almost my entire life, I have spent my days thinking about food, my weight, and what I looked like. I wanted to be skinnier, I wanted to disappear, because I couldn’t stand my own company. When I finally broke free and started to fill my life with love and passion, I knew I had to share my story with the rest of the world.

I wrote this book because I wanted to creatively construct a society that was based off of all of the mental anxieties that I endured. This book hones in on the injustice and discrimination that different sized people go through. I wrote this book because I wanted to highlight this prevalent issue that both men and women struggle with and the extent to which they do.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover just how much the constant pursuit for aesthetic perfection can consume you, and ultimately, become your primary life purpose. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to engage with how media affects our identities and versions of what it means to be healthy. Reading this book is an opportunity to understand the minds of individuals who have struggled or continue to struggle with the way they look in their daily lives. However, it is also an escape from the pressures of modern society into a world filled with scientific fantasy. You will be able to learn alongside main characters Ropashna, Deslin, and Influencer Jeenz about the importance of compassion and moderation.


The story: Tech buttons that are injected as soon as you are born and monitor your vitals, chemically perfected macro friendly Cheetos, Greek god-like figures who are known as Influencers, and the all-knowing Facegram app that monitors all of society. This is Speculo City, a society that runs off of you hating yourself.

Mirror Mania is where the magic happens; it is the law, government, police, everything. Here, Influencers use their media expertise, not biology, to determine all of society’s body weights. You’re scrap if you’re below your lowest assigned weight, and you’re undesirable if you’re above your highest assigned weight in Speculo. Maybe, if Mirror Mania sees potential in you, they’ll ask you to donate yourself to extract your cartilage and fat that can be used for booty enhancement experiments. You’re not allowed in certain places and it is against the law to wear body flattering skinsuits or transformative bodyshorts. If you’re not perfect, why should you deserve the same privileges as someone who works hard to maintain their perfect midpoint weight?

However, like most destructive lifestyles, there comes a time when change is necessary; it is inevitable, in fact. From the land of Sezolu, Ropashna comes from a background of aromatic foods and colorful dress. Ropashna, a fearless and independent girl, seeks to completely destroy Mirror Mania by deceiving the Influencers as she becomes an undercover Influencer Intern. After spending her life being in the perfect midpoint weight, but then losing her closest friends and her self worth after reaching beyond her highest weight point, she has nothing more to lose.

But her motivation is questioned with a charming yet confused fellow named Deslin. From the land of Telotulu, with vibrant music and cheery people, Deslin was a plump child filled with love from his Mother’s traditionally cooked meals, like handmade cassava rolls and sautéed poken. After moving to Speculo City, he was inevitably bullied, but right before going to university, his rock hard abs make an appearance for the first time. Like Ropashna, he wants to intern at Mirror Mania, but does he want to destroy it? Or does he want to change it?

Influencer Jeenz comes in and changes the story. She introduces Deslin to how much power he can have, but also reminds him of how destructive Mirror Mania’s promoting lifestyle choices can truly be. Ropashna’s fearlessness inspires him, but maybe her approach is too radical. Maybe, it’s not about changing the mirror, but how you choose to see the mirror instead.


You will love this book if you love a creative story that is applicable to real life. It is filled with references to pop culture, but also new inventions in a near futuristic world. Along with all of the sci-fi and body image talk, the story is frosted with love, deceit, humor, and friendship. The main characters are also from minority backgrounds too!

My book Mirror Mania speaks to young adults and adults who grapple with insecurities on what they look like and are struggling to define themselves in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Mirror Mania inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

What does it really mean to be healthy?

How much does the media influence your sense of personal identity?

What do you let define you?

I really look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. Coming together and discussing health, interpersonal relationships, media, and personal identity will change us all for the better.

 

The Book - Mirror Mania

The book is written in 3 Parts....

Part 1 contains the introduction + Chapters 1-7. This section focuses on building the world of Speculo and establishing the relationships and humanizing Ropashna and Deslin. You will experience the scientific fantasy of how Mirror Mania runs Speculo City and become immersed in the minds of the characters. Scenes of how the internship selection works with constant scanning for meeting perfect midpoint weight requirements, to the annual Sacrifice Masquerade Ball, a gaudy party for Mirror Mania members only will keep you captivated and curious.

Part 2 contains Chapters 8-13. These chapters flesh out the main conflicts of the story for Ropashna, Deslin, and Influencer Jeenz. More juicy interactions explain the interesting romance between the characters, as Deslin begins working closer with Ropashna and Influencer Jeenz. Other minor characters are introduced, cellulite cream experiments take place, and a secret society develops because Ropashna can’t wait any longer to destroy Mirror Mania. You will feel shocked, intrigued, and empathetic all at once.

Part 3 contains Chapters 14-19. This section focuses on bringing all of the motivations of the characters together. A scandal breaks out and intoxication is involved. You will not be able to stop reading or trying to think about what will happen next. The questions of what happens to Ropashna’s goal, Deslin’s personal issues, and Influencer Jeenz involvement are all answered in this part.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this December

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audio version.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish,

A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)

Early access to the Introduction of my Book and some additional sections of my manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback

The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover

I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

 

About the Author

I, Roveena Chand Jassal, am part of the MIT (Media, Information, Technology) program with a secondary major in Spanish at the University of Western Ontario. I am a passionate, strong-minded young woman who loves all things creative, laughing my heart out with friends and family, and trying new ice cream flavors!

I wrote this book because I wanted to write something that was very meaningful and applicable to real life, but also creative and explored the craftsmanship of writing. I love helping others, I love making others feel good, and words are one of the most effective ways to go about that.

Outside of this book, I am involved with more writing endeavors at Sun and Moon, my own page that discusses relationships and struggles of men and women in their 20s, Her Campus, and my school University of Western Ontario. Aside from writing, I enjoy all types of Bollywood and Caribbean dance, improvising on the piano, making song lyrics, sketching fashion models, and cooking traditional recipes.

For more information, you can connect with Roveena at roveenajassal@gmail.com and @roveena.inc on Instagram.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically, my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign, the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you, within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #MirrorMania and tag me, as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Roveena Jassal

story:
Women On Waves is the comprehensive history of the female wave-riding experience – performance, achievement, beach fashion, and feminine mystique in the world of surfing. There has never been a book that told the whole story about hundreds of thousands of women who surf.

 

While I was the editor and publisher of Surfer magazine we created more content on women surfing in Surfer than in all the time before or since. I always knew there was an audience of passionate female surf lovers – who were hungry for the real stories about women’s experience of wave riding. The positive response I received was enough to tell me the media was not doing enough to cover the amazing stuff going on out in the real world. I have been working on this project ever since then, and I know it will be something all wave lovers – but especially women – will enjoy.

As a the Editor of Surfer magazine, a Marketing Director at Quiksilver and the Media Director at Billabong and the President of the California Surf Museum I have been deep in the heart of women’s surfing for over four decades.

 

This work on the history of women’s surfing will be a definitive piece of surf culture and women’s sports history Anyone who is part of this effort will be a part of the history of surfing forever. Contributors will be making the most important reference about women’s surfing there is.

This is a legacy project for my part. It is what I will want to point to when someone asks what I contributed to surfing and to the society at large. And except for my family, there is nothing I love more than surfing – and I want to be able to say that the women who lived it got their just dues.

 

Over 700 women are written about in this once-in-a-generation history. Make sure each one gets honored as part of this great surfing life. Let’s let the world know about these special people and how they each made a difference. The book is being published July 7th so there is no risk that the project will not be successful. We want all of the people involved – the photographers and people who worked to make this happen be able to see their work fulfilled. And we want to be able to make sure the millions of people out in the world know this book is here. We want to offer them a chance to be part of this effort.

story:
Story of My Book

Personal Finance In a Public World is a book about using modern technology to develop healthy money habits.  A healthy relationship with money leads to happiness and improved overall wellness.

My name is Bob DePasquale and I am the author of "Personal Finance In a Public World". I wrote this book because I felt that technology was causing major financial stress for individuals.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that technology can actually have a positive effect on your money habits.  I hope to instill in you the same belief that technology can be used for good and that your finances don't have to be stressful. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you develop healthy money habits and make your life more joyful.

In this book, you'll learn about: 

How a piggy bank can teach an indelible lesson about the psychology of money.

and

How the advertisements that you see are actually controlled by you.

You'll see a story about:

What one family's definition of love can teach us about our financial priorities.

You will love this book if you use technology frequently, find your finances to be time-consuming, and wish you could lower your financial stress.

Personal Finance In a Public World is a nonfiction book that speaks to individuals and organizations who want to look at money and technology in a new way.

The Book - Personal Finance in a Public World

The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-3.  This section is designed to help you understand how today's technology and modern media affect how we think about money.  It includes insight into how habits are a powerful force in our lives.  It also describes how our technology use dictates the advertisements we see and ultimately affects our money decisions.  The conclusion comes with ideas about how it is natural for us to seek immediate satisfaction and financial gain yet it is more sustainable to develop healthy money habits.  

Part 2 contains chapters 4-11. This section describes specific areas of personal finance and how technology can be used to assist you in managing these parts of your life.  You will learn how a solid budget is determined by the amount of money you make and how investing is different than speculating.  The section touches on economics and cryptocurrenies to explain how the complicated subjects work.  You'll also learn about interest rates, credit, taxes, estate planning, and insurance work and tools that exist to help you makes deicsions about these subjects.  Finally, this part closes with a story of how generosity lends itself to joyful experience with the resources that you have.  

Part 3 contains chapters 12-17.  The closing section of the book is about prioritizing your relationship with money so that you your stress level is minimized.  It talks about how the concept of decisions fatigue and how it can be minimized by goal setting and advanced planning.  In the end, money is a tool that can give you control but not ultimately buy you happiness.  You will understand that healthy realtionships, with money and the people around you, are what bring us joy after reading this part.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2021.

The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).

You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

Campaign Goals

Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

About the Author


Bob is the founder of Initiate Impact, a virtually family office that provides modern financial management for purpose driven families, 

After expereincing the financial stresses resulting from modern technology, Bob felt it important to learn how to develop healthy money habits using technology for it's amazing benefits.

Bob is no stranger to social media binging.  Some times it takes a bad habit to recognize something isn't right.  As fun as it is to watch people make fools of themselves on Tik-tok, at a certain point Bob needed to find a way to use social media in a as a more positive force.

For more information, you can connect with Bob DePasquale at bob@bobdepasquale.com and @bdepa

twitter.com/bdepa

instagram.com/bdepa

linkedin.com/in/bobdepasquale

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:

Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks

Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)

Use this form [Add link to Google Form] to share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:

At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit ?)

Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.

When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!

Please use #[HASHTAG FOR BOOK] and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!

Bob DePasquale

This section describes specific areas of personal finance and how technology can be used to assist you in managing these parts of your life.  You will learn how a solid budget is determined by the amount of money you make and how investing is different than speculating.  The section touches on economics and cryptocurrenies to explain how the complicated subjects work.  You'll also learn about interest rates, credit, taxes, estate planning, and insurance work and tools that exist to help you makes deicsions about these subjects.  Finally, this part closes with a story of how generosity lends itself to joyful experience with the resources that you have.  Part 3 contains chapters 12-17.  The closing section of the book is about prioritizing your relationship with money so that you your stress level is minimized.  It talks about how the concept of decisions fatigue and how it can be minimized by goal setting and advanced planning.  In the end, money is a tool that can give you control but not ultimately buy you happiness.  You will understand that healthy realtionships, with money and the people around you, are what bring us joy after reading this part.
What I Need & What You'll Get
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2021.
The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter.I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
And much more!
Campaign Goals
Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover editionTier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.
About the Author
Bob is the founder of Initiate Impact, a virtually family office that provides modern financial management for purpose driven families, After expereincing the financial stresses resulting from modern technology, Bob felt it important to learn how to develop healthy money habits using technology for it's amazing benefits.Bob is no stranger to social media binging.  Some times it takes a bad habit to recognize something isn't right.  As fun as it is to watch people make fools of themselves on Tik-tok, at a certain point Bob needed to find a way to use social media in a as a more positive force.For more information, you can connect with Bob DePasquale at bob@bobdepasquale.com and @bdepa

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Brian Heiler, I'm the creator of PlaidStallions.com, host of the Toy-Ventures YouTube series and the author of the book "Rack Toys: Cheap, Crazed Playthings" which was all about 1970s and 80s dimestore toys.

For the last 20 years, I've also been a freelance writer and photographer whose work appeared in publications like Famous Monsters of Filmland, Toyfare,  Lee's Action Figure Review, SFX magazine, Toy Shop magazine and I was a regular columnist for the Village Voice's Topless Robot.

Toy-Ventures is an old school print magazine about vintage toys from the 1960s, 1970s, and 1980s covering topics and items that don't get the respect they deserve. 

Each issue will feature collector guides, rare photographs, interviews, and articles by some of the toy experts in the Collector Field.

Issue #1 will be a salute to the celebrated toy company Azrak-Hamway International or AHI and topics will include:

Affordable 23rd Century Technology

How AHI turned Star Trek's phasers and the USS Enterprise itself into major profits.

The Guide to World Famous Super Monsters-

The most comprehensive gallery of AHI's Universal Monsters action figure compiling every known figure and packaging variant plus we even delve into company history and solve a few mysteries.

Now, SkyDive Like Apes!

 The weird world of AHI's Planet of the Apes toys.

I wanted the Best!-

Steve recalls his long journey to own the fabled AHI KISS microphone.

The Future is Fantastic!-

A deep dive into the world of Space:1999 merchandise including some toys owned by Martin Landau himself.

Crime Fighting Drop Zone-
We talk about the long-running series of Super Heroes on Parachautes including card variations and prototypes.

Subsequent issues will cover toys from Mego, Hasbro, Remco, Ideal, Lincoln International, Fisher-Price, Kenner, Cipsa, Lili Ledy, Palitoy, Tomland, Matchbox, and more with guest articles written by some of the top collectors in the field.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We're looking to raise the minimum amount to get a print run going and to spread awareness, we'll be printing the magazine in Canada with a family-owned firm.

  • Kick in a buck- We'll thank you with some spooky Super Monsters Wall Paper
  • Get a digital copy- Even though we're fans of print, we realize you may not be and well, you can still help make this happen by contributing.

 

  • Physical Copy of Issue #1 with two collectible Super Monsters Buttons featuring the photography of our cover artist Corey LeChat. We are doing a limited run of buttons and these will not be offered again should we sell out.



Stretch Goal:

If we get to 1500 copies sold, I'll increase the page count by eight pages and add scans of the 1975 and 1974 AHI toy catalogs.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this on your social media accounts, your toy groups and with anyone you think might want to read Toy-Ventures Magazine. Getting the word out is the most important goal of this publication.
